Ein gemein Sanctus durch das
gantze Jahr.
SWähtz / ſwähtz / ſwähtz gir taß Kunx Zeba-
oth /Debbeß vnd Semme gir pilla tawas Ghodibas.
Hoſianna eekſchan auxtu Debbeß ſwähtz
gir tas kas tur nahk eekſchan to wahrdu tha Kungha.
Hoſianna eekſchan to auxtu Debbes.
Hie wendet ſich der Prieſter zum Volck /
vnd ſpricht:
Laideeta mums no Sirrdtz dibben luhkt / ka muhſ-
ẜo Kunx JEſus CHriſtus mums pawehleyis /vnd ſche-
ligu Paklauſẜiſchanu ẜohliyis gir.
MVhſẜu Tähws eekſchan to Debbes / ſwehtietz
tohp taws Wahrdtz : Eenahkas mums ta wa
Wallſtiba : Taws Prahtz noteek wirſẜon Semmes / ka
eekſchan Debbeß. Muhſẜu deeniſku Maiß dohd mums
ſchodeen / vnd peedohd mums muhſẜu Parradu /
ka mehs peedohdam muhſẜeems Parradneekeems. Vnd
nhe eewedd mums eekſchan Kahrdenaſchanas.
Das Chor.
Bett peſti mums no ļaunu / Amen.
Hierauff ſinget man das
Agnus DEI.
O tu Deewa Jährs tu jem vs töw tahs Paſ-
ẜaules Ghräkus / eſẜi mums ſchehliex. O tu
Deewa Jährs tu jem vs töw tahs Paſẜaules Ghräkus /
dohd mums tawu Meeru.
Agnus DEI Paſchalis.
Dee wa Jährs tu jemm
vs töw tas Paſẜaules Ghräkus eſẜi mums ſche-
liex. O tu Deewa Jährs
tu jemm vs töw tahs Paſẜaules Ghräkus /
dohd mums tawu Meeru.
Ein gemein Agnus.
O tu Deewa Jährs tu jemm vs töw tas Paſ-
ſaules Ghräkus eſẜi mums ſcheliex. O tu Deewa
Jährs tu jemm vs töw tahs Paſẜaules Ghräkus : Dohd
mums tawu Meeru.
Der Prieſter zum Volck.
Ta Kungha Meers gir allaſchien ar jums.
Das Chor.
Vnd ar tawu Gharru.
Hie reichet man das heilige Abendmahl des
wahren gegenwertigen Leibes vnd Bluts JESV
CHriſti / vnd wird geſungen :
JEſus CHriſtus vnſer Heyland.
JEſus CHriſtus muhſẜu Peſtitays / katters no mums Deewa
Eenaidibu jehme / czaur ẜawu ruhktu Mohku / Palliedſeya
tas mums no tahs Elles ẜahpes.
2. Ka mums muhſcham nhe by to aismirrſt / Dehwe tas mums
ẜawu Meeſẜu ehſt / Eekſchan to maſu Maiß mums nheẜaprotoht /
Vnd ẜawu Aſẜini dſerrt eekſchan to Wynu.
3. Kas ghribb py ſcho ghalldu eedt / Tam buhß labbe ẜawu leetu
apdohmaht / Kas nheczeenige ſcheit klaht eedt / Par to Dſiwibu tas
to Nahwu dabbu.
4. Töw buhß Deewu to Tähwu ſlaweht / ka tas töw tick lab-
be barryo / vnd par tawu Noſegummu / Ꞩawu Dählu gir litzis py
Kruſtu nokaut.
5. Töw buhß titzeht vnd nhe iſẜamiſt / Ka tha gir weena Barriba
tho Nheweſẜeļļo / Kattreems ta Sirdtz no Ghräkeems ghruta gir /
Vnd no Jßbail gir noſkummuſẜi warren.
6. Tahdu leelu lehnibu vnd ſchälaſtibu / Meckleh ta Ꞩirrdtz ar
leelu bähdu / Gir töw labb tad palleetz tur nohſt / Ka tu nhe dabbu
ļaunu Allgu.
7. Wings ẜacka patz nahzeeta juhß Nabbagi / Eß ghribbu man
par jums apſchälotees / Nhe kahtz Ahrſts tam Wäſẜälam gir waya-
ge / Wiņjo Darrbs tohp par ſmeeklu.
8. Kad tu warrätohß ẜöw ko nopellnitees / Kapehtz by tad wa-
yaga man par töw nomirrth / Schiß ghalldz töw arridſan nhe pal-
lieds / Ja tu ẜöw paſſcham pallidſeht ghribbi.
9. Titzi tu to no Ꞩirrdtz dibben / atſieſti ar to Mutt /tad eſẜi tu
labbe vnd pareiſe ghattaws / Vnd ta Barriba tawu Dweſẜel eepree-
zina.
10. Teems Augļeems nhe buhß arridſan ißpallicktißpallieckt / Tawu Tu-
waku buhß töw myļoht / Ka tu tam pallidſeht warr / Jhten ka taws
Deews py töw dariyis gir.
GOtt ſey gelobet vnd gebenedeyet.
DEwam mehs ſlawejam vnd ẜackam patteitzibu Aiſto wings
mums patz gir meelohyis :/: Ar ẜawu Meeſẜu vnd ar ẜawu
Aſẜini / to leetz Kunx Deews mums par labbu notickt / Kyrie
eleiſon.
2. Kunx czaur tawu ſwähtu Meeſſu / kattra no tawu Maht
Maria nahze / Vnd tas ſwähtz Aſẜins / Pallieds Kunx mums no
wiſẜams bähdams / Kyrie eleiſon.
3. Ta ſwähta Meeſẜa gir par mums nodohta / Eekſchan Nah-
wu / ka mehs czaur to warrätam dſiewoht :/: Nhe leelakuleekaku ſchälaſti-
bu warrätu tas mums dahwenaht / Py kattru mumsto by peemin-
neht / Kyrie eleiſon.
4. Kunx tawa leela Myläſtiba töw ſpeeduſẜi gir / Ka tawam
Aſẜinim py mums by leelu brienumu darrieth / vnd nomaxaht muhſ-
ẜu Parradu / Ka nu Deews attkal muhſẜu Draux gir tappis / Kyrie
eleiſon.
5. Deews dohd mums wiſẜeems ẜawu ſcheligu Swähtumu / ka mehs
eetam vs ẜaweems czeļļeems / eekſchan ihſtänu Myläſtibu / vnd brah-
ligu Peetitzibu / Ka mums ta Barriba nhe ähd to Ꞩirrdi / Kyrie eleiſ.
6. Kunx tawu ſwähtu Gharru muhſcham nhe attjemm no
mums / katters mums mahza turreht patteeſẜu Titzibu / ka tawa
nabbaga Chriſtita Draudſiba / dſiewo eekſchan Meeru vnd Wee-
naidibu / Kyrie eleiſon.
Collecten nach der Communion.
Deews Kunx gir ar jums. Antwort:
Mums noteek pehtz tawu Wahrdu.
Laideta mums Deewam patteickt:
O Patteeſẜe Deews / wiſẜewalldyx Tähws / mehs
luhdſam töw no Ꞩirdtz dibben / leetz mums nabba-
geems to Auglu vnd Dahwanu tahs ſwähtas
Mohzibas muhſẜa Kungha JEſu CHriſti / tas gir / to
ſchälaſtibu vnd Ghräko Pammeſſchanu ar titzigu Ꞩirr-
di ſtippre ẜayembt / ka mehs pehtz tawa myļa Dähla
Wahrdu / wiņja ſwähtu Meeſẜu vnd dahrgu Aſẜini / kat-
tru tas par mums nodehwis vnd ißlehyis gir / ar to
Maiß vnd Wynu patteſẜe äſẜam jämuſchi / czaur to paſ-
ſchu tawu myļu Dählu muhſẜu Kunghu JEſum Chri-
ſtum / katters ar töw vnd to ſwähtu Gharru dſiewo vnd
wallda pattees Deews allaſchien vnd muhſchige / Amen.
Ein ander.
OCh tu myļais Kunx vnd Deews / katters tu py
ſcho briniſku Wackarehden tawu Mohzibu pee-
minneht vnd mahziet mums pawehleyis eſẜi:
Dohd mums / Ka mehs to paſſchu tawu Meeſẜu vnd Aſ-
ẜini tha warram wallkoht / ka mehs tawu Labbu darri-
ſchanu ick deenas eekſchan mums nomannyht warram
Katters tu ar tawu Tähwu vnd to ſwähtu Gharru dſie-
wo vnd walldi / pattees Deews allaſchien vnd muhſchi-
ge / Amen.
Ein anders.
MEhß patteitzam töw / O Wiſẜewallditais Kunx
vnd Deews / ka tu mums czaur ſcho ſwähtu Da-
wanu eſẜi eepreezenayis: Vnd luhdſam tawu ſchä-
laſtibu / tu ghribbätu mums lickt to notickt par ſtippru Ti-
tzibu prettieb töw / vnd par karrſtu MyläſtibuMyläſtbiu ſtarpan
mums wiſẜeems / czaur JEſum CHriſtum tawu Dählu
muhſẜu Kunghu / Amen.
Ein anders.
MEhs patteitzam töw O ſchehliex Deews / kattri
mehs daſchadohs Ghräkohß eghrimmuſchi / nhe
neekadu Preeku äſẜam dabbuyuſchi / ka ween py
töw. Vnd luhdſam töw no Ꞩirdtz / tu nhe ghribbätu no
mums noghreeſt to ghaißmu tawa Waiga / nhe pehtz
muhſẜu Nopällnu / bett pehtz tawas leelas ſchälaſtibas /
muhſchige wayroht kas eekſchan mums eeẜahktz gir :
Czaur JEſum CHriſtum tawu Dählu muhſẜu Kun-
ghu / Amen.
Benedi-
Benedictio
oder Segen zum Volck.
Der Prieſter.
Tas Deews Kunx ap ghaißmo ẜawu Waigu par
mums / vnd gir mums ſchehliex.
Das Chor.
Tas Deews Kunx czell ẜawu Waigu vs mums /
vnd dohd mums ẜawu Meeru.
XXI.
Folgen Danckſagungen vnd Lobgeſänge
HERR GOtt dich loben wir.
KVnx Deews mehs teitzam töw / Kunx Deews mehs pattei-
tzam thöw.
Töw Tähws eekſchan muhſchige Ghohda ta Paſẜaule
ſchurp vnd turp.
Wiſẜi Engeļi vnd Däbbäſſes draudſiba / vnd kas peedärr py tawu
Ghohdu.
Arridſan Cherubin vnd Seerawin dſeed allaſchin ar auxtu Ballxni.
Swähtz gir muhſẜu Deews /
Swähtz gir muhſẜu Deews /
Swähtz gir muhſẜu Deews / tas Kunx Zebaoth.
Tawa Deewiſka Warra vnd Ghohdiba /
Eedt par Debbes vnd Semmes tahļe.
To ſwähto Apuſtuļļo Draudſiba / vnd wiſẜi myļi Proweetes.
Tee wiſẜi ſwähti Mohziti Teitz töw Kunx ar leelu Trohxni.
Ta wiſẜa Chriſtita draudſiba / Teitz töw wirſẜon Semmes allaſchien.
Töw Deews Tähws eekſchan auxtu Däbbäſẜu / Tawu taißnu vnd
weenigu Dählu.
To ſwähtu Gharru vnd Eepreezetayu / Ar taißnu Kallpoſchanu ta
teitz vnd ghohda.
Tu Konings tas ghodibas JEſu CHriſt / Deewa Tähwa muh-
ſchiex Dähls tu eſẜi.
Tu nhe eſẜi tahs Jumprawas Meeſẜu ẜaimoyis /
Ka tu to Czillwäku attpeſtitu.
Tu eſẜi tahs Nahwes Warru ſalauſiyis / Vnd to Däbbäſẜu att-
wehris.
Tu ſehd py Deewa labbas Rohkas / Ar wiſẜu ghohdu eekſchan Täh-
wa Wallſtibas.
Weens Ꞩohgis tu nahkams eſẜi / Par dſieweems vnd par Mirro-
ņeems.
Nu palliedſi mums Kunx taweems Kallpeems /
Kattri ar tawu dahrgu Aſẜini attpeſtiti gir.
Laid mums Debbeſẜiehß dallibai buht /
Ar teems ẜwähteems eekſchan muhſchigu Preeku.
Palliedſi taweems Ļaudeems Kunx JEſu CHriſt /
Vnd ſwehti kattri tawi Bährni gir.
Ꞩarrgi vnd ghlabbo tohs allaſchien / Vnd czell tohs auxte eekſchan
muhſchige.
Jckdeenas Kunx Deews mehs teitzam töw / Vnd ghohdam tawu
Wahrdu allaſchien.
Paſẜargi mums ſchodeen O ſcheliex Deews / Par wiſẜeems Ghrä-
keems vnd Noſeegummu.
Eſẜi mums ſchehliex O Kunx Deews / Eſſi mums ſchehliex eekſchan
wiſẜams bähdams.
Parradi mums tawu ſchälaſtibu / Ka muhſẜa czerriba vs töw ſtahw.
Vs töw czärram mehs myļais Kunx / Eekſchan Kaunu nhe attſtah
mums muhſchige / Amen.
Dich O GOTT loben wir.
TÖw O Deews mehs teitzam / Töw O Kunx mehs atſieſtam.
Thöw O muhſchiex Tähws / czeeni wiſẜa Semme.
Vnd wiſẜi Engeļi Debbeſẜies / Tawu ghohdu muhſchige at-
ſieſt.
Töw ar muhſchigeems Ballxneems / Cherubin vnd Serawin alla-
ſchien dſeed :
Swähtz / ſwähtz / ſwähtz O Deews vnd Kunx tho leelo Pullko.
Pills gir Debbeß vnd Semme / No to Wallſtibu tawas ghohdibas.
Tawu ghohdu ſlahweh vnde teitz Tee Apuſtuļi vnde Proweetes.
Töw ar ißleeſchanu ẜawu Aſẜini / Teitz wiſẜi Mohzity.
Töw czaur wiſẜu Paſẜaul / Atſieſt ta ſwähta Draudſiba.
O Thäws no nhemehrodamas Wallſtibas / Liedſu ghohdu dohd ta
tawam patteeſẜam vnd weenigam Dählam ẜawam Kungham.
Vnd tam Eepreezeetayam / tam czeenigam ſwähtam Gharram.
O CHriſte tu Konings tahs Ghohdibas /Deewa Tähwa weens
muhſchiex Dähls.
Katters tu palliedſädams vnd peſtidams tohs Ļaudis Tu Jumpra-
was Klehpi nhe eſẜi kauneyees.
Tu eſẜi teems titzigeems Deewa Wallſtibu attwehris / Vnd tahs
Nahwes ſkäpu vswareyis vnd ẜalauſiyis.
Tu eſẜi töw py Deewa labbahß Rohkas ẜädenayis / Eekſchan gho-
du ta Tähwa.
Mehs titzam töw / tu no turrenes attnaxi weens Ꞩohgis.
Tapehtz mehs luhdſam tawi Kallpi töw luhdſam /
Pallidſi mums / kattrus tu atpirrzis eſẜi / ar tawu dahrgu Aſẜini.
To muhſchigu ghohdibu tawo ſwähto leetz nums ar teems dabbuit.
Swähtus ghribbätu darrieth tawus Ļaudis / O Kunx: Vnd labb
darrieth / vnd jo palliedſeht taweems Bährneems: Vnd jo wall-
diet / vnd patzellt tohs nu vnd muhſchige.
Tad ghribbam mehs töw O Kunx / Jckdeenas ghohdaht.
Vnd tawu ghohdu allaſchien ſlahweht / Tawam Wahrdam muh-
ſchige patteickt.
Tu ghribbätu / O Kunx / mums ickdeenas / no Ghräkeems jo paſ-
ẜarghat.
Abſchäloyees töw O Kunx / Abſchäloyees töw par mums.
Laid mums notickt tawu ſchälaſtibu / Ka mehs vs töw czärram.
Vs töw czärram mehs O Kunx / nhe laid mums muhſcham kaunà
tapt : Tawas lehnibas dehļ / O ſchehliex Deews / Hallelujah.
Nun frewt euch lieben Chriſten gmein.
NVn preezayees myļa Chriſtita Draudſe / vnd laideeta mums
liexmodami deet :/: Ka mehs drohſche vnd wiß ween lieds / Ar
Preeku no Ꞩirdtz dſeedam / Ko Deews py mums darriyis gir /
vnd ẜawu leelu brieniſku darrbu / ļohte dahrge gir tas mums attpirzis.
2. Tas Wälls man czeetumà thurreya / Eekſchan Nahwes bi-
yu es paſuddis :/: Manni Ghräki man mohzi Deenas vnd Nacktis /
Eekſchan kattreems es biyu peedſimmis / Es ſtiggu allaſch dſiļļahk
eekſchan / Manna dſiwoſchana nhe derreya nheneeka leetas / Tee
Ghräki man by pahrjämuſchi.
3. Manni labbi darrbi nhe ſpehya nheneeka / Tee by wißkim ẜa-
maitati :/: Tas Czillwäka Prahtz enied Deewa ẜohdibu / Py labbu-
mu by tas nomirris / No bailibas es ghribbäyu iſẜamiſt / Nheneeka
ka Mirrſchana py man pallicka / Eekſchan Elles by mann eeghrimbt.
4. Tad abſchäloyahß tas muhſchiex Deews / Par mannu Nab-
badſiebu :/: Tas atghadayahs ẜawas ſchälaſtibas / Tas gribbeya
man lickt palliedſeht / Tas ghreeſe vs man ẜawu Tähwa Ꞩirrdi /
Nhe by tas tam pattees nhe kahdi ſmeekli / Ko tas czeeniya / to tas
dehwe.
5. Tas ẜatziya vs ẜawu myļu Dählu / Nu laix gir abſchälotees :/:
Brautz proyam tu czeeniex Waiņax mannas Ꞩirdtz / Vnd eſẜi to
Nabbago Peſtiſchana / Vnd palliedſi tohs aran to Ghräko bäh-
dams / Nomahtz to dehļ to ruhktu Nahwu / vnd leetz tohs ar töw
dſiewoht.
6. Tas Dähls tam Tähwam paklauſẜiex by / Tas nahze py
man wirſẜon Semmes :/: No weenas ſkieſtas vnd ſkaidras Jumpra-
was / Tam by mannam Braļam tapt / Wißkim ſläppän thurreya
tas ẜawu Warru / Tas aptehrpehß eekſchan mannu nabbagu
Meeſẜu / To Wällu ghribbeya tas ghuhſtiet.
7. Tas ẜatziya vs man / turrees töw py man / Nu buhß töw iß-
dohteeß :/: Es dohdohs man patz wißkim par töw / Turr ghribbu es
par töw czinietees / Aiſto es peedäru töw / vnd tu peedäri man / vnd
kur es palleeku / tur buhß töw buht / Tam Eenaidneekam nhe buhß
mums ſkirrt.
8. Tas ißleeß man mannu Aſẜini / Tha lieds mannu dſiewibu
laupieß: To wiß czeeſchu es töw par labb / to buhß töw ſtippre ti-
tzeht / Tho Nahwu apry manna Dſiewiba / Manna Taißniba näß
nohſt tawus Ghräkus / czaur to tu eſẜi ẜwähtz tappis.
9. Vs Debbes py mannu myļu Tähwu / Brautzu es no ſchahs
Dſiewoſchanas :/: Tur ghribbu es buht taws Mahzetayis / To
ſwähtu gharru ghribbu es töw doht / Tam buhs töw bähdohs ee-
preezeenaht / vnd mahziet mann pareiſe attſiet / vnd eekſchan Taiß-
nibas waddiet.
10. Ko es äßmu darriyis vnd mahziyis / To buhß töw darrieth
vnd mahziet :/: Ka Deewa Wallſtiba tohp wayrohta / Deewam
par Slawu vnd ghohdu / vnd ẜarrghayeß par tha Czillwäka Mah-
zibu / No to ẜamaita tha czeeniga Baggatiba / To attſtayu es töw
par pehdigupehdibu Mahzibu.
Nun lob mein Seel den HERREN.
NV ſlawe manna Dwehſẜel to Kunghu / vnd wis kas eekſchan
man gir wiņja ſwähtu Wahrdu :/: Ꞩawu labbedarriſchanu
tas wayro / Nhe aismirrſti to O manna Ꞩirdtz / Gir töw
peedewis tawus Ghräkus / vnd dſeedina tawu leelu Nheweſẜelibu /
Tas atpeſti tawu nabbagu dſiewibu / Jämm töw ſawà Klehpy / Ar
baggatu Preeku peepillda / Attjauna lieds tam Ehrļam / Tas Ko-
nings darra labb / Paſẜarga / kattri czeeſch eekſchan winja Wallſti-
bas.
2. Tas gir mums litzis ſinnaht / ſawu ſwähtu Teeſẜu vnnd
Ꞩohdibu :/: Ta lieds ẜawu lehnibu beß mitteſchanas / Nhe neeka
ſchälaſtibas nhe truhxt : Ꞩawu Dußmibu leek tas ghann pahreedt /
Nhe ẜohda mums ka mehs pellniyuſchi / To ſchälaſtibu tas nhe
ẜauds / Teems Jßbiyuſſcheems tas labb wehļ / Ꞩawa lehniba gir
ghattawa / Wiſẜeems kattri to biya / czeek tahļe tas auſtrums yhß
Wackaru / Tick tahļe gir muhſſu Ghräki nohſtjämbti.
3. Ka ſöw Tähws abſchäloyahs / Par ẜaweems nabbageems
maſeems Behrniņjeems :/: Tha darra tas Kunx mums Nabba-
geems / Ja mehs to ka ſkieſti Bährni byſtam / tas paſieſt ſawu Darr-
bu / vnd ſinna ka mehs Pießſli äſẜam : Jht ka ta Sahle vs lauku /
Weens Seedtz vnd krietuma lappa / tas wehgßch tur wirſẜon puhſ-
dams / tad wairs tas Seedtz nhe gir / Jhten ta taß Czillwähx nohſt
eedt / Wiņja ghalls tas gir tuwe klaht.
4. Ta Deewa ſchälaſtiba ween / Palleek allaſchien vnd ſtippra
muhſchige :/: Py ẜawas myļes draudſibas / kattra allaſch to bydama
ghattawa gir / Kattra ẜawu derribu turr / Wings wallda eekſchan
Däbbäſẜa Wallſtibas / Juhs ſtippri Engeļi darreeta / Wiņjam par
ſlawu / vnd kallpoyeeta wiſẜi lieds / Tam leelam Kungham par ghoh-
du / vnd turreeta wiņja ſwähtu Wahrdu / Mannai Dwehſẜelei buhß
arridſan wairoht / Deewa ſlawu py wiſẜams mallams.
Frölich wolln wir Hallelujah ſingen.
LJexmodami ghribbam mehs Hallelujah dſeedaht / No leelu
Preeku muhſẜas Ꞩirdtz vslehkt / Wiņja Schälaſtiba gir dell-
deyuſẜi wiſẜus muhſẜus Ghräkus / Eekſchan to äſẜam mehs
leelu baggatibu attradduſchi.
2. Wiß kaß dſiewo wirſẜon Semmes / buhs Deewu ſlaweht /
baggatige gir wiņja ſchälaſtiba par mums paczällta: Preeku / Dſie-
wibu / Stipprumu vnd Spähku äſẜam mehs manntoyuſchi / Elle /
Nahwe / Wälla Warra gir czaur to ẜamaitata.
3. Deews ſohla ſchälaſtibu wiſẜeems kattri uz to czerre / Preeku /
Palligu peeẜuhta tas wiſẜeems kattri vs to paļļauyahß: Stippre /
allaſch turr tas beß wiſẜu Willtu / Ka wiņja Wahrdtz ſtahſta / Aiſto
tas nhe warr mälloht.
4. Deewam gir ſlawa ſatzita / vnd wiņja weenigam Dählam
Swähtam Gharram patteeß / Deewam / ſpehziex weenà Wallſti-
bà: No Eeẜakumu tas by / palleek arridſan yhs ghallam / Wiſẜa
Paſẜaule räds to ſkaidre / Kunx nhe attgreeſees no mums.
Preyß mein Seel GOtt deinen HERREN.
SLawe manna Dwehſẜel Deewu tawu Kunghu / ghodi / dſeed
patteitz / vnd to allaſchien czeeni / Kamehr es dſiwoſchu / Preek-
ſchan to nhe maxa Czillwaka ſpähx / Vs leeleems Kungheems
nhe palaidees / Thee nhe war nheneekahd peſtiet.
2. Tee nomirſt kad wiņjo laix pee=eedt / Wiņjo Dwehſẜele ißeedt
no to ſemmigu Meeſẜu: Buhß attkall Semme tapt / Bett Deews
palleek muhſchige / Labb tam / kaß no Ꞩirdtz vs to palaiſchahß /
Wings näß Debbeß vnd Semm.
3. Tas turr muhſcham ko tas ẜohla / Jßdohd Teeſẜu kam nhe
patteeß tohp darrietz / Tohß Jßallkuſchus taß ähdina / Tas peſti
tohs kattri czeetumà tohp turräti / czeļļ aukſcham tohß ſemmeẜiſtus /
Teems Ackleems to czeļļu rahda.
4. Tohs labbus Deews myļo / Tho Barino Tähws gir tas
teeſcham / Vnd ghelb wiſẜus Nabbagus / preekſchan to wiſẜas ļau-
nas Runnas ißniext / Wiſẜu ļaunu taß par labbu darra / Wiß ſtahw
wiņja Rohkahß.
5. Zion wiņja titzigi Ļaudis vnd Karrſch / Eepreezayeeß Deewa
tawa Kungha dehļ / Tas wallda vnd paglabbo / Spehziex Könings
par wiß / Peſti mums arridſan no wiſẜu Nhelaimibu / Tahs Meeſ-
ẜas vnd tahs Dwehſẜeles.
6. Par to allaſch mehs tam patteitzam / ſlaweyam / ghohdam
vnd dſeedam / liexmodami Halleluja / Tam ſtippram Deewam Chri-
ſto ween / kattri mehs äſẜam wiņja ſwähta Draudſiba / Tam dſee-
dam mehs Halleluja.
Was Lobes ſolln wir dir O Vater ſingen?
KAhdu Patteitzibu buhs mums töw / O Tähws dſeedaht?
Tawu Darrbu nhe warr nhe weena Czillwäka Mehle ißrun-
naht.
Tu eſẜi mums patteeſẜus Siemes dehwis / Py kattreems mehs
tauwu ſchälaſtibu allaſch baudam.
To beßdeewigu Parao eekſchan Juhri eſẜi apſliezenayis / Vnd
Jſraëli eekẜchan Tuxneſſes ar Maiß vsturreyis.
Py to buhs mums allaſchien mahzietees / Ka tu ghribbi muhſ-
ẜu Meeſẜu vnd Dwehſẜel vsturreht.
Ka tu parrahditu tawu leelu brienuma darrbu / Eſẜi tu ẜalauſi-
yis to Hethitero ſpähku.
Turr klaht ar mums muhſchige ẜaderreyees / Labb tam / kat-
ters no Ꞩirdtz vs to pallaiſchahs.
O Tähws taws Wahrdtz paſtahw muhſchige / Teeſẜa /
Taißniba / vnd tawas Rohkes darrbi.
Tu ißpeſti kattri czietumà gir / Vnd neß nohſt to Laupiſchanu
ar leelu ghohdu.
Swähtz / brieniex / muhſcham palleekams gir taws Wahrdtz /
Kaß to byeſtahs / tas attraß to ghuddribu.
Slawa Ghohtz / vnd Patteitziba gir töw / O Tähws ẜatzieta /
Muhſcham vnd ſcheit arridſan wirſẜon ſchahß Semmes. Amen.
Gelobet ſey GOtt vnſer GOtt.
SLawähtz gir Deews muhſẜu Deews / Ka tas mums barroyis
gir / Ar ẜawu Wahrdu / tahs Dwehſẜeles Maiß / Kas tam
titz / tas nhe räds to Nahwu / Halleluja / Halleluja / Nu
teitzeeta Deewam / Hallelujah.
2. Slawähtz gir CHriſtus muhſẜu Preex / Aiſto tas gir ſawu
dſiewibu dewis / Ka mums nhe kait to Ghräko Waina / Wiņja
Wahrdtz gir mums ka ẜalldäns Wiens / Hallelujah / Hallelujah / Nu
teitzeeta Deewam / Halleluja.
3. Slawähtz gir tas ſwähtz Gharrs / ka tas mums ſchälaſti-
bu parada / Tohß trieß mehs luhdſam wiſẜe wairs / Ar Darrbeems
ta Titziba tohp labbe paradita / Hallelujah / Hallelujah / Nu teitzee-
ta Deewam / Halleluja.
XXII.
Vom Chriſtlichen Leben vnd Wandel.
Kompt her zu mir ſpricht GOttes Sohn.
NAhzeeta ſchurr py man / ẜacka Deewa / Dähls / Wiſẜi / kattri
juhs eſẜeeta abghrutenati / No Ghräkeems ļoht nomahkti /
Juhß Jauni / Wätzi / Ꞩeewas vnd Wyri / Es ghribbu
jums doht / kas mann gir / ghribbu dſeedenaht juhſẜu Wainu.
2. Manna Juhga gir ẜalldäna / manna naßta gir weegla / Kaß
to mann labpraht pehtz näß / To Ell tas ißbehx / Es ghribbu tam
teeſcham pallidſeht neſt / Ar mannu Palligu tas panahx / To muh-
ſchigu Däbbäſẜu Wallſtibu.
3. Ko eß äßmu darriyis vnd ſcheitan czeetis / Dſiewodams wäh-
le vnd aggre / To buhß jums arridſan darriet: Ko juhß domayeeta /
runnayeeta vnd darraita / Tas gir wiß labbs vnde pareiſe / Kad taß
noteek pehtz Deewa Prahtu.
4. Labpraht ghribbätu ta Paſẜaule ſwähta buht / Kad ween nhe
buhtu ta leela Nhelaimiba / kattra wiſẜeems Chriſtiteems Ļaudeems
ja=czeeſch : Nu nhe warr tas jo czittahde buht / Tapehtz eedohdeeß ar
labbu Prahtu / Ja tu ghribbi muhſchigas Mohkas ißbehkt.
5. Wiſſa raddita leeta dohd leezibu / kas dſiewo eekſchan Vhde-
ni / Lappu vnd Sahl / Ꞩawu czeeſchanu nhe warr tas ißbehkt / Kas
tad eekſchan Deewa Wahrdu nhe ghribb / pedtz buhß tam tad ta
Wälla Mohkas / Ar ghrutu Ꞩirrdi czeeſt.
6. Schodeen gir tas Czillwähx jaux / jauns vnd gharrſch / Rythe
gir tas jaw beſſpehtziex / ghanne dries tam arridſan ja=mirrſt / Ka tee
Pugki vs to lauku / Ta buhs tay krahßnai Paſẜaulei / Peepehſche
ẜamaitatay tapt.
7. Tha Paſẜaule ißbyhſtahs par to Nahwu / Kad kaßlabban
ghull paſtarohß bähdohß / tad ghribb taß pirrmahk attgreeſtees /
czittz ſtrahda to / czittz ſtrahda ſcho / Ꞩawu nabbagu Dwehſẜel
taß wißkim aismirſẜa / dſiewodams wirſẜon Semmes.
8. Vnd kad tas wairs nhe warr dſiewoht / Tad eeẜahk tas ļohte
ſchälohteeß / ghribbahß Deewam tad padohteeß / Es titzu patteeß /
ka Deewa ſchläſtiba / kattru wings allaſch nitzinayis gir / Nhe läh-
te par to nahx.
9. Tam Baggatam nhe pallieds ẜawa Mannta / Tam Jau-
nam nhe pallieds ẜawa leppniba. Tam buhß no ſchennenes noſkirrth:
Kad kam=labban buhtu wiſẜa Paſẜaule / Ꞩuddrabs vnd Sältz / vnd
wiſẜa Nauda / tomähr buhß tam nomirrth.
10. Tam Mahzetayam nhe pallieds ẜawa ſinnaſchana / Tahs
Paſẜaules Leppniba gir wißkim wellt / Mums buhs wiſẜeems no-
mirrth: Kas CHriſto ſöw nhe padohdahß / Kamehrt tas dſiwo eek-
ſchan ſchehligu laiku / Muhſcham buhß tam ißnickt.
11. Klauſẜaitees vnd jemmeeta währa juhß myļi Bährni / Kattri
taggad eſẜeeta Deewam paddäwuſſcheeß / Nhe bähdateeß juhß ta-
pehtz : Titzeeta ſtippre Deewa Wahrdam / taß gir juhſẜu Preex / vnd
ſtippris Pills / Deews jums krahßne ee=preezenahs.
12. Nhe attmaxayeeta ļaun ar ļaun / Raugait ka juhß nhenoſeezi-
ge dſiewoyeeta / Laid ta Paſẜaule jums nitzina / Deews ẜohdys / tam
dohdeeta to ghohdu / To ſchauru czeļļu allaſch ſtaygayeeta / Deews
to Paſẜaul ẜohdys.
13. Kad tas klahtohs ka mehs ghribbam / Ar Weſẜelibu vnd
leelu Manntu / ghann dries juhß attkahptu / Tapehtz attẜuhta
Deews tohs bähdus / Ka juhſẜu Meeſẜa pahrmahzita tohp / Vnd
vsturrata py muhſchigu Preeku.
14. Gir jums ta Nhelaimiba ruhkta vnd ghruta / Apdomayee-
ta ka karrſta ta Elle gir / Eekſchan kattru ta Paſẜaule eetäck: Ar
Meeſẜu vnd Dwehſẜel buhs czeeſt / beß mitteſchanas to muhſchigu
Mohku / vnd nhewarr tomehr ẜadeckt.
15. Bett jums buhs pehtz ſcho laiku / Ar Chriſto tas muhſchiex
Preex / Vs to buhs jums domaht / Nhe weens Czillwäx nhe dſiewo
kas iſẜatziet warr / To ghodu vnd to muhſchigu allgu / kattru tas
Kunx jums dawenahs.
16. Vnd ko tas muhſchiex lehniex Deews / Ꞩawà Wahrdà gir
ẜohliyis / ſwährädams py ẜawu Wahrdu / To turrehs vnd dohß
tas itt teeſcham / Tas pallieds mums py to Engeļo Drauds / czaur
JEſum CHriſtum / Amen.
Jch ruff zu dir HERR JEſu CHriſt.
ES peeẜautſchu töw Kunx JEſu CHriſt / Es luhdſchu pa-
klauſẜi mannu ſuhdſeſchanu :/: Dohd man ſchälaſtibu ſchinny
laikà / Nhe laid man jo iſẜamiſt / To yhſtänu Titzibu Kunx
es ghribbu / To ghribbätu tu man doht / töw ween kallpoht / Man-
nam Tuwakam palliedſeht / Tawu Wahrdu teeſcham turreht.
2. Es wehl luhdſchu O Kunx Deews / tu warri man to ghann
doht :/: Ka es nhe tohpu proyam kaunà / To czerribu dohd man
klaht : Wiß wairahk tad kad man ja=mirrſt / ka es warru vs thöw
paļļautees / vnd nhe dohtees / vs wiſẜu mannu Darrbu / czittahde
taß man ſchähl buhs.
3. Dohd man ka es no Ꞩirdtz dibben / Manneems Prettiebnee-
keems warru peedoht :/: Peedohd man arridſan ſchinny ſtundà / dohd
man jaunu dſiewibu : Leetz tawam Wahrdam allaſch mannu barri-
bu buht / Ar to mannu Dwehſẜel barryoht / ka es warru prettieb
ſtahweht / kad Nhelaimiba vs eedt / kattra man dries warr no töw
nowehrſt.
4. Nhe leetz man kahdu Karumu neds Baidu no töw / Eekſchan
ſchahs Paſẜaules noghreeſt :/: Allaſch py töw pallickt lieds ghallam
dohd man / Thöw ween gir taß Rohkà / Vnd kam tu dohd / tam gir
tas wellt / Nhe warr to nhe weens eemantoht / neds nopellniet Ar
darrbeems / Tawa ſchälaſtiba / Ta nums attpeſti no to Nahwu.
5. Es ghullu Karryà / vnd ſtahwu prettieb / O Kunx CHriſt
pallieds tam Wayam :/: Py tawu ſchälaſtibu es peeliepu / Tu war-
ri man ſtippraku darriet : Ja nu nahk Kahrdenaſchana / tad pallied-
ſi / ka ta man apkahrt nhe ſtumm / tu warri ißtaiſẜiet / Ka es lixtà nhe
tohpu / Es ſinnu tu no mann nhe attſtahſẜi.
Wol dem der in GOttes furchten ſteht.
LAbb tam / kas eekſchan Deewa biyaſchanas ſtahw / vnd wirſ-
ẜon wiņja czeļļu ſtaiga / Tawai paſſchai Rohkai töw barryoht
buhß / Tad tu dſiewo pareiſe / vnd töw labb klahyahs.
2. Tawa Ꞩeewa buhs tawà Nammà / Ka kahtz Wynaſarrß
pills krahßno Oghu / Vnd tawi Bährni apkahrt tawu ghalldu / Ka
ölya ſtahdas Wäſẜäli vnd jauni.
3. Reds tahdu Raſchu tas Wiers dabbu / kaß eekſchan Deewa
biyaſchanas dſiewo / No to mitteyahß ta wätza Lahſta vnd Dußmi-
ba / kattra teems Czillwäkeems gir peedſimbta.
4. No Zion Deews töw ſwehtieß / Ka tu redſehs allaſchien / To
laimu tas Pillis Jeruſalem / Kattru Deews ſchehlige vs luhko.
5. Tas ẜaudſehs tawu dſiewibu / Vnd ar lehnibu allaſch py töw
buhs / Ka tu redſeſẜi Bährno Bährnus / Vnd ka Jſraël Meeru att-
rohd.
Wie ſchön leuchtet der Morgenſtern.
KA ſpohſche attſpied ta Rytaß Swaigſne / Pilla Schälaſti-
bas vnd Teeſẜibas no to Kunghu / Tas ẜalldäns Ꞩacknis
Jeſſe :/: Tu Dawida Dähls no Jäcoba Tautu / mans Ko-
nings vnd mans Brudgams / Eſẜi mannu Ꞩirrdi abjehmis: My-
liex / laipnis / jaux vnd krahßnis / leels vnd ghohdiex / baggahtz no
Dahwaneems / Auxtz vnd ļohte czeeniyams.
2. Och manna Pehrle tu dahrx Wainax / Patteeſẜe Deewa vnd
Marias Dähls / weens auxts peedſimbtz Konings :/: Manna
Ꞩirrdtz ẜautz töw par krahßnu Pugki / Taws ẜalldäns Ewangeli-
ums / gir tyers Peens vnde Mäddus: Och manna Pugkite / Ho-
ſianna / Deewa Maiſe / ko mehs ähdam / Es töwis nhe warru ais-
mirrſt.
3. Eeley ļohte dſiļļe eekſchan mannu Ꞩirrdi / tu ſpohſch krahß-
nis dahrx Ackmins / to Löhßmu tawas Myläſtibas :/: Vnd ee=pree-
zini mann / ka es tock palleeku / py tawu jauku Meeſẜu / weens dſiews
Ꞩahneskauls: Pehtz töw / gir man / ſcheligà Debbeſſes Rohſe /
Nhewäſſala vnd ghruſd / Manna Ꞩirrdtz no Myläſtibas ee=wai-
nohta.
4. No Deewu nahk man weens preeziex ghaiſchums / kad tu ar
taweems Atztingeems / Mann mylige vsluhko :/: O Kunx JEſu /
mann leela baggatiba / taws Wahrdtz / taws Gharrs / tawa Meeſẜa
vnd Aſẜins / mann eekſchige attſpirdſina: Jemm mann / mylige / Tawà
Klehpi / ka es tohpu ẜilltz no ſchälaſtibas / Vs tawu Wahrdu nahku
es aitzenahtz.
5. Kunx Deews Tähws / manns ſtippris Karyawiers / tu eſẜi mann
muhſchige preekſch tas Paſẜaules / Eekſchan tawu Dählu myļoyis :/:
taws Dähls gir ẜöw ar mann ẜaderreyees / Wings gir mans draud-
ſings es äßmuäßwu wiņja Bruhte / tadehļ es ļohte liexmoyohß: Eya /
Eya / debbeſkigu dſiewoſchanu / wings dohß / mann turr auxtu / muh-
ſchige buhß mannai Ꞩirrdei to teickt.
6. Staipaita thas Stieghas vs Kohklehms / vnd leetzeeta tohß
krahßnus dſeeßmus / ar lyxmibu atſkanneht :/: Ka es warru ar JE-
ſu CHriſt mannu krahßnu jauku Bruhdgamu / muhſchige Myläſti-
ba pallickt: Dſeedeeta / deyeta / lighoyeeta / liexmoyeeta / Patteitzee-
ta tam Kungham / leels gir tas Konings tahs ghohdibas.
7. Ka äßmu es no Ꞩirdtz liexmis / Ka manns Draudſings eeẜahk
vnd beids / tas gir tas Eeeẜakums vnd ghalls :/: Tas man wehl ẜöw
par ghohdu / Vsjembs eekſchan to Paradieẜu / Tapehtz plickſkinu
es ẜawas Rohkas : Amen / Amen / Nahtz tu kraßnis Preekas Wai-
nax nhe palleetz illge / Töwis ghaidu es Ꞩirrdtz.
Warumb betrüſtu dich metni Hertz.
KApehtz eſẜi noſkummuſẜi manna Ꞩirdtz / bähdayees vnd czeet
ẜahpes / Par to laizigu baggatibu / czerre vs tawu myļu dee-
wu / katters wiſẜas leetas raddiyis gir.
2. Tas ne ghribb neds warr töw attſtaht / tas arridſan ghanne
ſinn / kas töw wayaga gir / debbes vnd Semme peedärr tam / Mans
Tähws / vnd mans Kunx Deews / katters man klaht ſtahw eekſchan
wiſẜams bähdams.
3. Kad tu mans Deews vnd Tähws eſẜi / Tawu Bährnu tu muh-
ſchige nhe attſtahſẜi / Tu Tähwiga Ꞩirdtz / Es äßmu weena nabbaga
Semmes Piethe / wirſẜon Semmes es nhe ſinnu nhekahdu Preeku.
4. Tas baggahtz pallaiſchahß ẜöw vs ẜawu laizigu Manntu /
bett es ghribbu czerreht vs ẜawu Deewu / Jeb es tohpu nitzinahtz /
Tomähr ſinnu es vnd titzu ſtippre / Kas vs Deewu czerre / tam nhe
truhxt nheneeka.
5. Elia kas töw barryoya / kad tick illge Leetus nhe liya / Tahdà
ghruhta dahrga laikà / Weena Attraitne no Sidoniero ẜemmes / Py
kattras tu no Deewu tappi ẜuhtietz.
6. Vnd ka töw nheneeka peetruhktu / Kad tu klauſẜiyi tawam
myļam Deewam / Vnd darriyi ko tas töw pawehleya / By teems
Kraukļeems Meeſẜas vnd Maiß / Töw allaſch peeneſt rytohß vnd
wackarohß.
7. Kad tu ghulleyi appakſchan weenu Pa=Eggly / Deewa En-
gelis py töw nahze / Attneſẜe töw ehſt vnd dſerrt / Tad ghayi tu ghar-
ru czeļļu / Lieds tam Kallnam Horepam.
8. To Danieļu Deews arridſan nhe aismirrſẜa / Kad tas ſtarpan
teems plehſẜigeems Swäreems ẜehdeya / ẜawu Engeli peeẜuhtiya tas
tam / Vnd licka tam Barribu peeneſt / czaur ẜawu Kallpu Habacuc.
9. Joſeps eekſchan Egyptero ſemmes pahrdohtz tappa / No Pa-
rao to Koniņju czeetumà kalltz / ẜawas Deewabiyaſchanas dehļ /
Deews czehle to par weenu leelu Kunghu / Ka tas warreya ẜawu
Tähwu vnd ẜawus Braļus barryoht.
10. Tas ſchehliex Deews arridſan nhe attſtaya / Tohß tries
Wierus eekſchan karrſtu Vggunigu czeppli / Ꞩawu Engeli tas no-
ẜuhtiya / Paſẜargaya tohß no Vgguns lähßmeems / Vnd pallidſeya
tohß aran wiſẜahms bähdams.
11. Och Deews tu eſẜi taggad wehl tick baggahtz / Ka tu eſẜi biyis
muhſchige / Manna czerriba ſtahw wiſchkim vs töw / darri mann py
mañas Dweſẜeles baggatubeggatu / tad gir mañ ghañ ſcheitan vnd muhſchige.
12. To laizigu ghohdu ghribbu es labpraht pee=czeeſt / dohd
mann O Kunx to muhſchigu / kattru tu nopellniyis eſẜi / Ar tawu
ghrutu ruhktu Nahwu / To luhdſu es töw mans Kunx vnd Deews.
13. Wiß kas gir wirſẜon ſchahs Paſẜaules Jeb gir ẜuddrabs /
Sältz / jeb arridſan Naude / Baggatiba vnd laiziga Mannta / Tas
ſtahw maſu brietinyu / Vnd nhe pallieds nhe neekahd Debbeſẜies.
14. Es patteitzſchu töw O CHriſte Deewa Däls / Ka tu man
to eſẜi litzis mahziet / czaur tawu Deewiſku Wahrdu / dohd man ka
es vs to paſtahwu Vnd tha muhſchige ſwähtz tohpu.
15. Slawa / Ghohtz vnd Patteikſchana gir töw ẜatzita / Par
tawu wiſẜu paradietu labb darriſchanu / Es luhdſu no Ꞩirdtz / nhe
laid man no tawu Waigu / Nohſt ſtumbtam pallickt muhſchige /
Amen.
Siehe wie gantz lieblich vnd ſein.
RAugi / ka mylige vnd krahßne / Stahw CHriſtus vnd ẜawi
Lohzekļi / Py kattreems gir wiß ween lieds / Labb / Ļaun / ka
noteekahß / Weena Meeſẜa / weena Karraſcha / gir tas ar
mums / czaur ẜawu gharru ẜappietz.
2. Kattru tas eekſchan wiſẜu ẜawu Meeſẜu / vnd wiſẜeems ẜa-
weems Lohzekļeems :/: Licka notetzeht baggatige / Ka Aaroņa Sal-
we darriya / Kattra eekſchan ẜawahms Drehbems vnd Bahrdu / kad
tas par auxtu Baſnizas=Kungu tappa czälltz / pa kohpam notetzeya.
3. Wiņja ſchälaſtiba eekſchan mums wiſẜeems täck / vnd wiſẜi
wiņjo dawani :/: Ka ta Raſẜa wirſẜon Kallneems darra / no to auxtu
Debbeß : Ta buhs mums arridſan proyam braukt / payembtees ta
Tuwaka bähdus / no brahligas Myläſtibas.
4. Tad ghribb tas Kunx muhſẜu Deews / ſawu ſchälaſtibu mums
doht :/: Ka mums buhß ſcheitan vnde turrp / Manntoht to Dſiewi-
bu : Kattru mums nopellniyiß JEſus CHriſt / Taß muhſẜu muh-
ſchiex Mahzetays gir / No Mirroņeems vsczälltz.
Von GOtt wil ich nicht laſſen.
NO Deewu es nhe ghribbu attkahpt / Aiſto wings nhe att-
ſtahw no mann: Wädd man vs ihſtänu czeļļu / czittahd es
ļohte allohtu : Ꞩneeds mann ẜawu Rohku / Rytohß vnde
wackarohß / wings man labb peebaryoh / kurya Semmeh buhdams.
2. Kad Czillwäka Schälaſtiba / vnd labbdarriſchana mitte-
yahß :/: Tad Deews dries attrohdahß / Sawa ſpähku vnd Schä-
laſtibu parahda: Pallieds wiſẜahs bähdahs / Peßti no Ghräku vnd
Kaunu / no Kehdehms vnd no Ꞩaitehms / ta lieds arridſan no
Nahwes.
3. Vs to ghribbu es paļļautees / mannà ghruhtà laikà :/: Tas
mann nhe buhß ſchähl / Wings noghreeſch wiſẜu ļaun : Es tam wiß-
ſkim pawehlu / Mannu Meeſẜu / mannu Dwehſẜel / mannu dſiewi-
bu / Wiß gir Deewam padohta / Wings warr darrieth / Ka tam
pattiek.
4. Tas ween wiņjam pattiek / Kas mann wayaga gir :/: Wings
myļo mums no Ꞩirdtz dibben / dohd mums to Kunghu CHriſt / Ja
ẜawu myļu Dählu: / czaur to wings mums ee=dahwena / Kas Meeß
vnd Dweſẜel warr vsturreht / Slahweyeeta to Debbeſẜys.
5. Slahweyeeta to ar Ꞩirrdi vnd Mutt / wings abbediwi
mums dohd :/: Tha gir ſwähta ſtunda / eekſchan kattras mehs wiņ-
ju eeghadayam / czittz laix wiß ißniext / eekſchan kattru mehs dſiewo-
yam / mums buhß ſwähteems tapt / vnd pallickt muhſchige.
6. Jeb ta Paſẜaule ißniext / ar ẜawu leppnibu vnd Ghreſnibu :/:
Neds Ghohdiba vnd Mannta palleek / Ta by pirmahk auxta:
Mehs tohpam nomirruſchi / dſiļļi Semme ee=rackti / kad mehs ghul-
leyuſchi äſẜam / ghribb Deews mums Vsmohdenaht.
7. Ta Dweſẜele nhe paſuhd / wäßta eekſchan Abrahams Kleh-
pi :/: Ta Meeſẜa tohp jauna peedſimbta / beß wiſẜeems Ghräkeems /
wiſkim ſwähta / vnd ſkieſta / Weens Bährns vnd Mannteeneex tha
Kungha / To mums czittahd nhe pahr=runnahß / taß Wälls ar ẜa-
wu Willtibu.
8. Tapetz jeb es ſcheitan czeeſchu / Nhelaimibu vnd Mohkas :/:
Ka es tohs ghann nopällnu / tomähr nahk muhſchiex laix / Gir pills
Preezibas / Tho patti beß wiſẜas mitteſchanas / ka es CHriſtum at-
ſieſtu / mann buhß redſeht vnd juſt.
9. Tas gir Deewa Tähwa Prahtz / katters mums raddiyis
gir :/: Wiņja Dählam gir dauds labbumu / Schälaſtibu tas mums
nopellniyis gir: Arridſan Deews tas ſwähtais Gharrs / Eekſchan
Titzibas tas mums wallda / Eekſchan Däbbäſẜa=wallſtibas tas
mums wadda / Tam mehs patteitzam.
O Menſch wolleſt bedencken.
O Tu Czillwähx apdohma / Mannu leelu ruhktu Mohku :/:
Es ghribbu töw attkal dahwenaht / To dſiewibu par to Na-
wu / Py man buhs töw thurreteeß / Es äßmu töw par lab-
be / To Däbbäſẜu attwehris.
2. Es nhe äßmu töw attneſẜis / czaur Ꞩuddrabbu vnd Sälltu :/:
Ar mannu Aſẜini nomaxayis / Ka eſẜi tu tad tick läppnis? Wirſẜon
Semmes Manntu ẜakraht / czaur to tawu Dwehſẜel ẜamaitaht / ar-
rieg es töw to mahziyu?
3. Kas ſcheitan to Baggatibu eeghribbahs / Par mannu Leh-
nibu :/: To buhß tay Ruhſẜei ẜamaitaht / vnd buht tam muhſchige
ſchähl : Ꞩackrahtu eekſchan Däbbäſẜu / Tur juhß attraſẜeeta to lee-
tu / Kaß jums py Dwehſẜeles wayaga gir.
4. Tee Pugki wirſẜon to Lauku / ka krahßne tee turr ſtahw :/:
Tee nhe maxa ar Naudu / To Krahßnumu / kattra teems gir : Sa-
lomons ẜawahß Drehbehß / Nhe by lieds weenai lappai / To paſ-
ſcho Pugkiņjo.
5. Tee Puttninyi appackſchan Debbeß / gir liexmi ẜawà lißdà :/:
Tahs Lapſas ẜawà Allà / Tohp no mann paſẜarghatas / Es nhe äß-
mu nheneeka patturreyeeß / Vs ko es ẜawu ghallwu licktlieckt warru /
Kas kaitas gir tad mann nu ?
6. Debbes vnd Semme mann peedärr / Wiß Krahßnums ar-
ridſan klaht :/: Kas ghribb tad mann mannus Ļaudis ißwillt / Kat-
trus es äßmu weddis / Aran Egyptero Semmes / Ar ẜawu ſtippru
Rohku / Eekſchan tahs ẜohlitas Semmes.
7. Tapehtz nhe bähdayeeteeß / Kattri juhß manni Mahzekļi eſ-
ẜeeta :/: Par Barribu neds par Drehbems / Es ghadayu par jums /
Es ghribbu jums wiſẜus barryoht / Par Auxtumu / Baddu Paſẜar-
gaht / To titzeeta mann patteeſẜe.
8. Tad eſẜeeta nu ar Meeru / Ar to Allgu kattra jums kļuhſt :/:
Mans Tähws jums allaſchien dohß / Wiß kas jums wayaga gir /
Ka juhß nhe iſẜamiſẜaht / Kad jums paſtarà Deenà / Preekſchan ta
Czillwäka Dählu jaſtahw.
9. Ghohtz / ſlawa vnd Patteitziba / Gir Deewam ẜatzita muh-
ſchige :/: Par ẜawu jauku Mahzibu / Kattru tas mums gir ẜattaiſ-
ſiyis / Ar ẜawu Deewiſku Mutt / Taß pallieds wiſẜahs Stundahs /
Eekſchan Däbäſẜu=wallſtibas.
Jch weiß mir ein Blümlein iſt hübſch vnd fein.
ES ſinnohß ẜöw weenu Pugkiet / ta gir jauka vnd ſkaiſta /
Ta gir man pa Pratam / Ta patiek eekſchan mannu Ꞩirrdi /
Ta patti Pugkite / par wiſẜeems czitteems Pugkitems.
2. Ta Pugkite gir tas Deewa Wahrdtz / Kattru Deews mums
gir dehwis / Tas wädd mums vs to ſchauru czeļļu / ſcheit vnd turr /
Eekſchan tahs muhſchigas dſiewoſchanas.
3. Tas gir tas czellſch / tas ghaiſchums / tee Wahrti / Ta
Taißniba vnd ta Dſiewiba / Kas ẜawo Ghräko dehļ bähdayahß /
vnd no teems attſtahy / Tam gir tee czaur CHriſtum peedohti.
4. Tas ẜacka : nahzeeta ſchurr wiſẜi py mann / Wiſẜi kattreems
ta Ꞩirrdtz gir ghruta / Es ghribbu ka juhs paſſchi ghribbaht / to ti-
tzaht / Dſeedenaht juhſẜu Wainu.
5. Jemmeeta / ähdeeta / ta gir manna Meeſẜa / Kattru taggad
es jums dohmu / Es dahwenu jums wiſẜu mannu Manntu / Ka
juhs warreeta mannis peemineht.
6. Jemmeeta vnd dſerreeta tas gir mans Aſẜins / To äßmu
es juhſẜo dehļ ißleyis / Katters ghanne darra par juhſẜeems Ghrä-
keems / czeekahrt juhs to darraita / Ka es jums to äßmu eeſtadi-
yis.
7. Mehs luhdſam töw Kunx JEſu CHriſt / czaur tawu ruhktu
Mohku / Ka tu par mums nomirris eſẜi / Kunx JEſu CHriſt / Tu
nhe ghribbätu no mums attſtaht.
8. Vsjemm mums par taweems Bährneems / Ka mehs töw al-
laſchien ſlaweyam / Tawu Wahrdu attſiſtam mehs wiſẜi / vs ihſtä-
nu czeļļu / czaur JEſum CHriſtum / Amen.
Lieb GOtt für allen dingen.
MYļo Deewu par wiſẜahms leetams / no Ꞩirrdtz dibben :/:
No wiņja Wahrdu dſeed / allaſch ick ſtundas / Wiņja ſlawu
allaſchien / turri tawà Mutte.
2. Myļo arridſan tawu Tuwaku / beß wiſẜu Schullti :/: Ka
tas tawu labbu Ꞩirrdi / Allaſch nomanniet warr: Vnd töw palleek
ſkieſta Dwehſẜele.
3. Pee=eedt töw Nhelaimiba / Nhe wiſkim ißbyſtees :/: Ar leh-
nigu Prahtu czeet / jeb ta to Ꞩirrdi ähd: Deews ſinna to ihſtänu
laiku / Kad tam pattiek.
4. Wiſẜohß tawohß bähdohß / Palligu meckle :/: No Deewu
ween tawu Kunghu / Tas töw dohs / Kas töw wayaga gir / to tu
patz redſehſẜi.
5. Gir Deews töw dehwis / Pillu Rohku :/: Nhe laid bähdas
czeeſt / Kattreems peetruhxt : Tawu nabbagu Tuwaku / ähdini /
dſirrdini / atſpirrdſini.
6. Wiſẜu Leppnibu vnd ghreſnibu / no Ꞩirdtz nitzini :/: Aiſto
Deews patz to nhe ee=räds / ẜohda to allaſchien : Czaur Myläſtibu
vnd ſemmigu Ꞩirrdi / Wiņja Slawu ißplatti.
7. Ar Ähſchanu vnd ar Dſerrſchanu / turri labbu Mähru :/:
To allaſch eeghadayeeß / Ka Deews to eenied / To leelu Plieteſſcha-
nu / tapehtz eſẜi ghaddiex.
8. Tohs krahßnus jaunus Ļaudis / Tu nhe peewill :/: Laid tee
Wiſẜu ghohdibu / allaſch no töw räds : Ghohdu vnd Deewa biya-
ſchanu / Tu teems mahzi.
9. Ar ghohdu warri tu buht / preeziex no Ꞩirdtz :/: Czittu nhe
apprunna / ar ghohdu ẜmaidi : Aiſto Preeziba vnd Liexmiba / Pa-
yämm dauds bähdas.
10. Py Ꞩeewiſkeems / ar ghohdu dſiewo :/: Nhe runna tu
aplamm / tu tohs kauneyees: Tad buhs töw ghohtz vnd teickſcha-
na / allaſch par Allgu.
11. Kas nu darriehs / pehtz ſcho Mahzibu :/: Tas ẜawu Mann-
tu / baggatige ẜakrahß : Vnd ẜawas Deenas peedſiewohs / Ar ghoh-
du Deewam pattickdams.
XXIII.
Vom Creutz / Verfolgung vnd Anfechtung.
Was kan vns kommen an für Noht.
KAhda Waida warr mums notickt / Kad mums tas Kunx patz
ghanna :/: Vnd meelo mums ar ẜawu Maiß / Vnd vs ẜawu
ghannibu wadda : Ta lieds eepreezena muhſẜu Ꞩirrdi / Vnd
dſirrdena ar to ẜaldu Vdeni Ꞩawa czeenigaczeenia ſwähta gharra.
2. Ꞩawa dahrga Wahrda pehtz / Tas mums wädd vs ihſtänu
czeļļu :/: Nhe laiſch nhekahdà laikà nhe ee=preezatus / buhdamus
Lixtà vnd Waidà : Tapehtz mehs allaſch drohſſchi äſẜam / Jrr paſ-
ſchà Nahwes ähna vnd Mohkams / Aiſto tu Kunx eſẜi py mums.
3. Tas ghanniklis vnd Siſlis muhſẜa ghanna / Mums eepree-
zena vnd ẜunni :/: Tha Nelaime ſlahpeena tahs Meeſẜas Karumu /
Ka ta nhe darra bähdas / Tam gharram czaur to Ghräko Wainu /
kattra muhſẜà Mirrſtamà Meeſẜà gir / Vnd allaſchien kuſtenayahß.
4. Tu eſẜi mums packlayis weenu ghalldu / Kattru mehs allaſch
vsluhkoyam :/: Tawa ſwähta Wahrda czeenigu barribu / Kattru
mehs muhſẜahs Ꞩirrdihß ghrämmoyam : Kad mums tas Wälls
ar ẜawu Willtibu vseedt / Ta patti muhſẜu Dwehſẜel eepreezena / Ar
tawa gharra Pillnibu.
5. Tawa Lehniba vnd Schälaſtiba / Tapehtz allaſch py mums
palleek :/: No ſcho laiku vnd muhſchige / Tu eſẜi muhſẜo Paglabbo-
tays / Ka mehs ſcheit eekſchan Titzibas äſẜam / Turr redſige tawà
Wallſtibà / Nammineeki vnd Ꞩaime.
6. To pallieds mums muhſẜu Kunx JEſus CHriſt / Katters
muhſẜas Ꞩirrdes ẜattaiſẜa :/: Czaur ihſtänu Titzibu vnd Myläſtibu /
Ka mehs to Tähwu warram redſeht / Czaur to / tha lieds tam ſwäh-
tam Gharram / Kas to no Ꞩirrdtz dibben eeghribbahs / tas ẜacka ar
mums / Amen.
Jn dich hab ich gehoffet HERR.
VS töw Deews Kunx es äßmu paļahweeß / Palliedſi ka es kau-
nà nhe tohpu / Neds muhſcham ſmeeklà : To luhdſchu es töw /
Vsturri mann / Tawà lehnibà Kunx Deews.
2. Tawas ſchehligas Auſẜis ghrees ſchurr py mann / Paklauſẜi
mannu Luhkſchanu / nahtz ſchurr preekſchan / Steidſees mann dries
palliedſeht / Bähdà vnd Waidà / Es ghullu vnd ſtahwu / Palliedſi
man no mannu Lixtu.
3. Manns Deews vnd ghlabbotays ſtahw tu mann klaht / Eſẜi
manna Pillis / eekſchan kattras es drohſche / vnd ka Wiers drieſtu
kautees / Ar ẜawu Waideneeku / Tho gir dauds / Prett mann pa
abbeem puſſeem.
4. Tu eſẜi manns ſtipprumsſtipprunis / mans Ackmins / manna Pills / Man-
nas Brunņas / manns Spähx / to mahza taws Wahrdtz / Manns
Palliex / manna Peſtiſchana vnd Dſiewiba / Mañs warräns Deews /
wiſſahs bähdahß / Kas ſpeh töw prettieb ſtahweht.
5. Mann ghribb ta Paſẜaule peewillt / Ar Mälleems vnd ar nhe-
patteeſẜu Vsrunnaſchanu / Dauds Tieklus vnd Slaßdus mann iß-
taiſẜiyuſẜi: Kunx ghelb / ſchinnieß bähdahs / Paſẜargi man par willtibu.
6. Kunx mannu Dwehſẜel es töw pawehļu / manns Deews / manns
Deews / nhe attſtah no mann / Jemm mann tawahs Rohkahs / O
Pattees Deews / no wiſſahms bähdams / Palliedſi mann paſtarà
ghallà.
7. Ghohtz / Slawa vnd Patteitziba / Gir töw Deews Täws
vnd Dähls ẜattaiſẜita / Ta lieds tam ſwähtam Gharram / taws
deewiſkis Spähx / ſattaiſẜa mums ſtipprus / czaur JEſum Chri-
ſtum / Amen.
Da es wol gieng / mein Hertz vnd Sinn.
Jm Thon :
O HERRE GOtt dein Göttlich Wort.
KAd labb klahyehß / Manna Ꞩirrdtz vnd Prahtz / By alla-
ſchien breeßmibà :/: Nhelaimibu bydamahs / kattra mann nu
ſpeeſch / Vnd mann ļohte vseedt: Nu kad nhe labb gir / Deews
tomähr py mann ſtahw / Vnd pallieds to Naßtu panneſt / Kad neds
Laime / neds Nhelaimiba / Mann muhſchige warrehs ſchaubiet.
2. Bett vs Deewu / manna Ꞩirrdtz drohſche / Allaſch preezige pa-
dohdahs :/: Tas ſchurrp vnd turrp / tohs Deewabiyatayus ghlabba /
Ka teems nhe warr kahda Nhelaime peekahpt / to Beßdeewigo Riex-
te / ka tee dohma / nhe muhſcham ſchauties / tohs Deewabiyatayus / ar
muhſchigu Ꞩahp / Kunx tawu nabbagu Kohpiņju.
3. Kunx darri labb / ka tam buhs buht / teems labbeems rahmeems
Ꞩirrdeems :/: Vnd teems Beßdeewigeems / dohd ẜawu Allgu / muh-
ſchigas Mohkas vnd ſahpes: Taws Meers allaſch Py mums pal-
leek / Kattri mehs ſcheit vs tow czärram / Laid ta Paſẜaule / ja tay
pattiek / To Dußmibu nomannyht.
4. O Kunx Deews / palliedſi no bähdams / wiſẜeems noſkummu-
ſcheems Ꞩirrdeems :/: Tu paſieſti tohs / ka tee muhſcham Bähdada-
mi nhe gir liexmi / Nhopuſſchahß vs töw / peſty tu tohß / Ka tu mums
eſẜi ẜohliyis / Tu weens ghribbi / Eepreezeenaht / Wiſẜus kattri vs töw
czerre.
5. Leelas Ꞩirrdes ẜahpes / Mann ļohte ſpeeſch / Ka tu Deews
pattz to ſinni :/: Tas gir taws Prahtz / Palliedſi mann kluſẜam / vnd
peezeetige panneſt / Tawu Riext / Mannas Meeſẜas / Kattra
man ſchauſch vnd pamahza / Vnd ißtwaika / to Paſẜaul apnick-
dams / Vs tawu Wallſtibu czerreyu.
6. Teitan Bähdas / muhſchige / mums nhe aiſkars :/: Ghräki
vnd Nahwe / vnd wiſẜenahde Lixta / Wiſkim nomitteſẜees. Preex vnd
Lyxmiba / Tanni paſſchà Stundà / Tad mums ẜakamps / O Kunx
vnd Deews / ſkubbenayeeß / Vnd nahtz ar tawu Wallſtibu.
7. Kadu Preeku / Tas Czillwähx ſcheit / Peedſiewo vs ſchahs
Semmes :/: Kam allaſch buhs / ẜawas Nahwes / vnd Bähdas
preekſch Atzims redſeht : Ta Nhelaimiba / allaſch ſpaida / labbus
vnde Rahmus / Kurr Meers vnd Preex / Ar Parghallwibu / Gir
ļauneems vnde blehſcheems.
8. Bett ta Naßta / jaw taggad buhß / vs paſſchu ghallu pa-
czällta :/: Par Preeku muhſẜo Waida / buhß parwahrßta / O Kunx
tu nhe warri mälloht. Bett muhſchigas Mohkas / Buhß allaſch
teems Beßdeewigeems / O Kunx vnd Deews / tawa Tähwigu
Ꞩirrdi / Muhſcham no mums nhe nogrees.
An Waſſer Flüſſen Babylon.
PY Babyloņa Vhdens Straumes / Teitan ẜehdeyam mehs
bähdadameeß :/: Kad mehs domayam vs Zion / Tad rauda-
yam mehs no Ꞩirrdtz: Mehs peekahrem ar ghrutu Ꞩirrdi /
Tahs Stabbules vnde Kohkles / Py wiņja Wyhtoleems / Kattri
gir augguſſchi wiņja Semme / Teitam by mums dauds Kaunu vnd
ſmeeklu / Jck=deenas no teems paczeeſt.
2. Kattri mums illge Czeetumà turreya / Tanny paſſchà weetà :/:
Ghribbeya no mums kahdu dſeeßmu / ar ļohte ſpieweems Wahr-
deems / Vnd meckleya muhſẜà Noſkummibà / Weenu preezigu dſeeß-
mu: Och mehs luhdſam / padſeedaht / Weenu Patteitziba dſeeß-
mu / weenu jauku dſeeßminyu / No teems Dſeeßmeems no Zion /
kattri jauke attſkanne.
3. Ka by mums tahdà Czeetumà / vnd leelà nhelaimibà :/: Tam
Kungham dſeedaht ẜawu dſeeßmu / tick ſweſſchà Semmeh : Jeruſa-
lem ja es töwis aiſmirſtu / Tad tas taißnis Deews / laid aismirrſt
mannis / kamehrt es dſiewoyu / Ja es töwis nhe peeminnu / Tad laid
mannai Mehlei peekehrteeß / Vnd py to Schohgli peelipt.
4. Ja es nhe ar wiſẜu ſpähku / Jeruſalem töw czeeniyu :/: Ee-
ẜahkdams mannu Preeku vnd ſlawu / Taggadien vnd muhſchige :
Peeminn tohs Bährnus Edom ļohte / Tah deena Jeruſalem / O
Kunx / Kattri ẜawà Dußmibà ẜacka : Plehß ſemme / plehs ſemme ick
ſtundas / Jßpohſty tohs lieds patt Dibbinam / To Pammatu ghrib-
bam mehs maitaht.
5. Tu ſkaudiga Meita Babylon / ẜalauſita vnd ißpohſtita :/:
labb tam / kas töw dohs ẜawu Allgu / Vnd töw attkal attmaxa /
Tawu Pahrghallwibu vnd leelu blehdibu / Vnd mähro töw ar tah-
du Mähru / ka tu mums eſẜi mehroyis / Labb tam katters tawus ma-
ſus Bährnus / Ꞩakamp vnd ſweeſch tohs py Ackmini / Ka tu tohpi
aiſmirſta.
Mag Jch Vnglück nicht wiederſtahn.
JA es nhe warru Nhelaimibai prett ſtahweht / Vnd ta Paſ-
ẜaule mann eenied / Mannas labbas Titzibas dehļ :/: Tad
tomähr es to ſinnu / Ta gir manna ghuddriba / Deewa Leh-
niba vnd ſchälaſtiba / To buhs teems man attſtaht : Deews nhe gir
taļe / Maſu briedi / Tas ẜöw paſleppyahß / teekams tas nomahz /
Kattri mann ẜawu Wahrdu ghribb aplaupiet.
2. Es ißtaiſẜu ka ghribbädams ẜawas lietas / wahgs buhdams /
vnd kad Deews mann leek beedinaht :/: Tad tomähr es ſinnu / nhe-
weena Warra muhſcham palleek / taß gir wiß labbahx / Tam laizi-
gam buhß ißniekt : Ta muhſchiga baggatiba / darra drohſſchu Ꞩirr-
di / py to es palleeku / nhe bähdadams nheneeku / Deews pallieds
man to Vswarreht.
3. Wiſſas leetas weenu briedi ſtahw / ẜackams Wahrdtz gir /
Kunx JEſu CHriſt / Tu ſtahweſẜi mann py ẜahneem :/: Vnd red-
ſeſẜi vs mannu Nhelaimibu / Jht buhtu ta tawa / Kad tavs mann
vsbrux: Buhs mann to tad czeeſt / ſchinny laikà / Paſẜaule ka töw
pattiek / Deews gir mannas Brunņas / Tas mann ghanne pawad-
dies.
Zu dir allein in dieſer Noht.
TÖw ween ſchinnieß lelohs bähdohs / Mehs tawi Bährni pee-
ẜautzam :/: Vs töw / tu wiſẜo ſcheligais Deews / Stahw
muhſẜu Preex vnd czerriba: Tu ghribbätu tawohs dußmohß /
Tahs ſchälaſtibas attghadatees / vnd muhs wiſkim nhe ẜamaitaht.
2. Pilla blehdibas / Deewam ſchähl / gir ſchi Semme / Teems
Ghräkeems wiſkim paſẜadawuſẜees :/: Tomähr dauds labbi töw pa-
ſieſtami / Pehtz tawu Prahtu dſiewo : Aiſto tu tawu Baſnizu ſchi-
ny weetà / Töw eſẜi taiſẜiyees czaur tawu Wahrdu / Tahs nhe ghrib-
bätu tu aismirrſt.
3. Tas leelais Pullx töw / Kunx / neezina / Pehtz tawu Wahrdu
nheneeka bähda :/: Jeb mehs ghribbätam ar muhſẜu Spähku / Nhe
warram mehs teems to aisleekt: Tomähr mehs vs töw czerreyam / tu
nhe lixi mums attmaxaht / Wiņjo blehdibu vnd Noſeedſibu.
4. Ar Ghrähkeems mehs arridſan apghrutenati äſẜam / Tee gir
mums ſchähl mums Nabbageems :/: To ẜohdibu vnd Riext äſẜam
mehs pellniyuſchi / Bett tu par mums töw abſchäloyees: Jemm nohſt
no mums muhſẜus Noſegumus / Kattrus CHriſtus par mums gir
attmaxayis / vnd ka weens Tähws mums pamahzi.
5. Tu nhe eſẜi nhe weenkahrt bes Palligu vnd Preeku / tawus Ļau-
dis / O Deews attſtayis :/: Jſraeli tu atpeſtiyis eſẜi / Juhry vs ẜauſẜu
czeļļu / Kad nhe neekahtz Palliex wairs ghaiditins by / czaur töw ween
tee Ļaudis peſtiti tappa / tas Waideneex nhe warreya teems kaiteht.
6. Tha nu arridſan nahtz mums Palliga / Kattri mehs äſẜam
bähdohs : Ka mehs nhe tohpam ar Sobini vnd Vgguni / Nokauti
ſchodeen jeb riethe : Ta Waida kattra gir rädſäta / Py Wiereems /
py Ꞩeewahms / py maſeems Bährneems / Nhe laid mums wairahk
redſeht.
7. Schy Semme mums eedohta gir / Preekſch dauds Ꞩim-
teems Ghaddeems :/: Ka tee tawu Wahrdu / O JEſu CHriſt /
Teems Ļaudeems mahzitu. Bett tee gir wairahk meckleyuſchi /
ẜawu paſſchu labbumu / ghohdu vnd Preeku / Töwis ghann mas
ohladami.
8. To eſẜi tu paczeeßdams tick illge / Kunx Deews warreyis pa-
czeeſt :/: Nun vsmohſti tu / vnd isbaidini mums / Ka mehs no bai-
lu iſẜatruhzeenayamees: Tawa Ꞩohdiba / Tähws / gir allaſch pa-
reiſa / Mehs darram ka Bährni / kattri kullti tohp / Tee nhe ẜackahs
kapehtz.
9. Jaw ẜenn ſchi Allga nopellnita gir / Jhsſchim eſẜi tu ghai-
diyis :/: Ka tam ta kahdu briedi notickt by / Tapehtz gir dauds baſchi-
yuſſchees: Ꞩcho Auku dauds gir paredſeyuſſchi / Tam buhs juſt kas
nhe ghribb titzeht / Ar kaunu vnd Wainaneems mahziteeß.
10. Kunx CHriſt ſchinnies leelohs bähdohs / Mehs töw no
Ꞩirrdtz peeẜautzam :/: Tawas nabbagas Awis labbe paſẜargi / Ka
tohs tee Willki nhe apry / Tawà ghlabbſchanà mehs Meeſẜu vnd
Dwehſẜel / Ähkus / Manntu ar Ꞩeewams vnd Bährneems / Töw
ween tohs pawehleyam.
12. Muhſſeems Kungeems dohd to Prahtu / Ka tee pareis no Ghrä-
keems atſtayahs :/: Vnd dſiewo pehtz tawu Wahrdu / töw parr ghoh-
du vnd ſlawu / Töw biedamees ghaddige dſiewo / No Ꞩirdtz dibben
ſkaiſte töw kallpo / Teeſẜu vnd Taißnibu ghlabbo.
3. Dauds tuhxtoſchi Ļaudis gir / Kattri no töw / O Deews /
nhe dſirrd :/: Tohs nhe leetz illghake mulldeht / To czeļļu vs töw
teems mahzi / kurr taws Ghohtz nhe tohp mecklähtz / Turr arridſan
laime nhe gir ghaiditina / Turr vs töw nhe warr paļautees.
14. Ka mehs ſchinny laikà peſtiti tohpam / Leelus Kungus
vnd Wirrſẜeneekus pamohdini :/: Dohd Paddomu / Spähku / dohd
drohſchibu / Ka Prettibneex iſẜabyhſtahs : Kad mehs petz to jauku
Meeru / czaur tawu ſchälaſtibu dabbuyuſchi buhſẜim / Muhſchige
ghribbam mehs töw patteickt.
15. Scho dſeeßmu mehs dſeedayuſchi äſẜam / Töw Kunx vnde
Deews peeluhkt : / : Abſchäloyees töw par mums O JEſu CHriſt /
Muhſẜas Ꞩirrdes py töw ghreeſi : Muhſẜus Wahrdus tu ween pa-
ſieſti / Muhſẜa dſiewiba ſtahw tawà Rohkà / Vs Czillwäkeems mehs
nhe paļauyameeß.
Wend ab deinen Zorn / lieber GOtt.
ATtjemm tawu Dußmibu / myļais Deews / ar lehnibu / Vnd nhe
leetz barrghoht tawu aſẜinainu Riexte / Nhe ẜohdi mums barr-
ghe pehtz muhſẜu Nopällnu / Bett ar ſchälaſtibu.
2. Aiſto ja tu ghribbi pehtz Nopellnibu ẜohdiet / kas warr tawu
Dußmibu vnd Barſẜibu panneſt / Wiſẜam by paſuſt / ko tu Kunx eſẜi
raddiyis / No tawu Ꞩohdibu.
3. Peedohd Kunx ſchehlige muhſẜu leelu Parradu / Attrau ta-
wu Teeſẜu / parrahdi tawu ſchälaſtibu / Aiſto tu ſchählo ar leelu leh-
nibu / Mums ẜaudſeht.
4. Jo mehs äſẜam nabbagi Tahrpi / Pieſchli vnd Semme / Ar
dſimbteems Ghräkeems / Wahyibu / Vnd nahwu apgruhtenati /
Kapehtz by mums wiſkim boya eedt / dußmohß beß ſchälaſtibas.
5. Vsluhko tawa Dähla Kruſtu vnd ruhktas Mohkas / Kat-
ters mums peſtiyis gir ar ẜawu Aſẜini / Vnd litzis attdurrt ſawu Ꞩirr-
di vnd Ꞩahnu / Tai Paſẜaulei par labb.
6. Tapehtz O Tähws nhe leetz mums ẜamaitaht / Tawu Schä-
laſtibu vnd Gharru czaur CHriſtum mums dohd / Darri mums ar
to tahs Debbeſẜes Manteneekus / Ar töw dſiewoht.
Wenn wir in höchſten Nöhten ſein.
KAd mehs wiß leelakohs bähdohs äſẜam / Vnd nhe ſinnam kur
mums buhs pallickt / Vnd nhe attrodam Palligu neds Pad-
domu / Jeb mehs bähdayamees aggre vnd wähle.
2. Tad mehs ar to ween ee=preezayameeß / Ka mehs wiſẜi ween
lieds / Töw peeẜautzam O ſchehliex Deews / Ka tu mums peſtitu
no wiſẜams bähdams.
3. Vnd paczeļļam muhſẜas Atzis vnd Ꞩirrdi / Vs töw ar leelu
Waidu vnd Nopuhſchanu / Vnd meckleyam to Ghräko peedoſcha-
nu / Vnd wiſẜas Ꞩohdibas Attlaiſchanu.
4. Kattru tu ẜohli ſchälige / Wiſſeems kattri töw tapehtz pee-
luhds / Eekſchan to Wahrdu tawa Dähla JEſu CHriſti / Katters
muhſẜo Peſtitais vnd Aisbilldetais gir.
5. Tapehtz nahkam mehs / O Kunx vnd Deews / vnd ẜuhdſam
töw wiſẜus muhſẜus bähdus / No wiſẜeems Ļaudeems attſtahti / Lee-
ļà Noſkumſchanà vnd breeßmibà.
6. Nhe vsluhko muhſẜus leelus Ghräkus / Attpeſti mums no
teems ſchehlige / Stahw klaht py mums eekſchan muhſẜu Waidu /
Palliedſi mums no wiſẜu Nhelaimibu.
7. Ka mehs warram no Ꞩirrdtz / Preezahdami töw patteickt /
Packlauſẜigi buht pehtz tawu Wahrdu / Töw allaſch vnd muhſchige
ſlaweyam.

etc.
