Nahwes ẜaites / Vnd py ẜöw jembtees ẜawà Wallſtibà / Turr buhß
tam tad ar mann ween lieds.
11. Eekſchan preezibu dſiewoht muhſchige : Turr palliedſi
mums Deews ſchehlige. O Kunx peedohd wiſẜu muhſẜu Parradu /
Palliedſi ka mehs ghaidam no Ꞩirdtz.
12. Kad muhſẜa ſtunda paeedt klaht / Ka tad muhſẜa Titziba al-
laſch mohdriga gir / Tawam Wahrdam titzeht ſtippre / Ta war-
ram aiſmickt czaur JEſum CHriſtum / Amen.
HERR JEſu CHriſt ich weiß gar wol.
Jm Thon:
Wenn mein Stündlein verhanden iſt.
KVnx JEſu Chriſt es ghanne ſinnu / Ka man ween reisbuhs
nomirrth :/: Bett kad tam buhs ta notickt / Vnd ka es pee-
kuſẜiſchu / Ar ẜawu Meeſẜu / to es nhe ſinnu / Tas gir ween
tawà ẜohdibà / Tu ſinni mannu paſtaru ghallu.
2 . Vnd ka mann ( ka tu ſinni /) czaur tawa Gharra Dahwa-
nu :/: Py töw ween tas labbakais Preex / Eekſchan mannas Ꞩirrdtz
gir : Vnd ſtippre titzu ka tu weens / Mann no Ghräkeems ſkieſte no-
maſghayis / Vnd ar tawu Aſẜini attpirrzis.
3. Tad luhdſcho es töw Kunx JEſu CHriſt / Patturri mann
py tahdu Prahtu :/: Vnd nhe leeds mann nhe kahdu briedi / Ock
Deews no töwim attkahpt : Bett py töw pallickt ſtippre / Kamehr
ta Dwehſẜele no ẜawu Weetu / Eekſchan Däbbäſẜu eebraux.
4. Ja tas warr buht tad dohd mann Kunx / Prahtige no ſchen-
nenes noſkirrt :/: Ka es ẜawu Dwehſẜel ar pillu Prahtu / Pawehļu
tawahs Rohkahs : Eekſchan tahdu Titzibu weegle vnd liexmige /
Vs ẜawu Ghulltu jeb cziſẜu / Warru no ſchennenes nobraukt.
5. Bett ja tu ghribbi vs lauku / Ar laupiſchanu wirß ſweſſchu
Eſchu :/: Vdens Ghräkà / Karrſtumà jeb Auxtumà / Jeb czaur
Mehŗa Trummeems : Pehtz tawu Prahtu mann attjembt / Tad
teeſẜa mann Kunx ka tu ſinni / Ka es dſiewodams vs töw titzeyu.
6. Bett ja es ar leelu ẜahp / Mann nhe pareiſe turrätohß :/: Jeb
eetu / jeb plix ghullätu / Vnd applam mellſchu: To Kunx tu mann
nhe peelagadi / Aiſto es nhe attghadayohs / Vnd nhe warru atſie-
tees.
7. Ock Kunx dohd mann Nahwes mohkahß / diſchane turreh-
tees :/: Vnd palliedſi ka manna Ꞩirdtz / Weeglam tohp noſpeeſta :
Vnd ka kahda Swetze beß leelu ẜahp / Vs tawu nhenoſeeguſchu Aſ-
ẜini ißdſeeſt / Kattru tu mannis dehļ eſẜi ißlehyis.
8. Tomähr es nhe ghribbu töw mahziet / Neds mannu Ghallu
rahdiet :/: Bett py töw allaſchien pallickt / Vs tawu Wahrdu czär-
rädams : Vnd titzeht ka tu ka tas leels Kunx / Tahs dſiewibas mann
attpeſtieſẜi / Es mirrſtu jeb kurr buhdams.
9. Tapehtz es ẜawà Prahtà / Mann wiſkim töw padohmohs :/:
Aiſto ta Nahwe gir mann par Auglu / Bett tu eſẜi manna dſiewiba:
Vnd mannu Meeſẜu beß wiſẜu Waidu / To es teeſcham ſinnu / paſta-
rà Deenà / Py muhſchigas dſiewoſchanas vsmohdenahſẜi.
Ach lieben Chriſten ſeid getroſt.
OCk myļi Chriſtiti Ļaudis eſẜeeta drohſchi / Kapehtz juhß ta iſ-
ẜabyhſtatees? :/: Kad mums tas Kunx ẜohdi / Laideeta mums
no Ꞩirdtz dibben ẜatziet : To ẜohdibu äſẜam mehs ghann pell-
niyuſchi / to buhs ick kattram attſietees / nhe weens nhe drieſt to leektees.
2. Eekſchan tawahms Rohkams mehs dohdamees / O Deews tu
myļais Tähws :/: Aiſto muhſẜa Staighaſchana gir py töw / Schei-
tan mums nhe ghribbahs ißdohtees: Kamehr mehs ſchinny buhdà äſ-
ẜam / Gir Waidi ween / Mohkas vnd bähdas / Py töw mehs Preeku
ghaidam.
3. Nhe kahdu Wahrpu tas Queeſchaghrautz näß / Ja tas nhe ee-
kriet Semmeh :/: Ta buhs arridſan muhſẜai ſemmigai Meeſẜai / Par
Pieſchlu vnd Pällnu tapt : Pirms ta nahk tanni ghodibà / Kattru tu
Kunx CHriſt mums eſẜi ẜattaiſẜiyis / czaur tawu Noeeſchanu py
Tähwu.
4. Kapehtz ghribbam mehs dauds tad bytees / Par to Nahwu
wirſẜon ſchahs Semmes? :/: Tomähr ween reis gir ja=mirrſt / O labb
tam kas ſcheitan gir biyis : Katters ka Simeons aismeeg / Ꞩawus
ghräkus attſieſt / CHriſtum ẜayämm / Ta buhß tam Czillwäkam no-
mirrt.
5. Apdohma tawu Dwehſẜel / paſẜarrgi tawu Meeſẜu / Laid Deews
tas Tähws ghada :/: Wiņja Engeļi tawi ẜarrgi gir / Paghlabbo töw
no wiſẜu ļaun : Ja ka kahda kluxtama Wiſta ẜawus Czaliſchus / Ap-
ẜäds ar ẜaweems ſpahrniſcheems / Ta darra Deews arridſan mums
Nabbageems.
6. Mehs äſẜam nomohdà / jeb ghullam / Tad tomähr mehs Dee-
wam peedäram :/: Vs CHriſtum mehs äſẜam Chriſtiti / Tas warr
tam Wällam prettie ſtahweht : No Adamu vs mums nahk ta Nah-
we / CHriſtus pallieds mums no wiſẜahms bähdams / Tapehtz ſlah-
weyam mehs to Kunghu.
Wenn mein Stündlein verhanden iſt.
KAd manna Stundinya daggayuſẜi gir / Vnd mann jabrautz
manns czellſch :/: Tad pawadi mann O Kunx JEſu Chriſt /
Beß Palligu mann nhe attſtah : Mannu Dwehſẜel mannà
paſtarà ghallà / Es pawehļu tawahs Rohkas / Tu to ghann labb
paſẜarrghaſẜi.
2. Manni Ghräki mann ļoht ehdieß / Manna ſinnama Ꞩirdtz
mann mohzies :/: Aiſto manno Ghräko tick dauds ka Juhres ſmill-
ſchi / Tomähr es nhe ghribbu ißbailotees : Peemineht ghribbu es ta-
wu Nahwu / Kunx JEſu CHriſt taws ẜarrkans Aſẜins / Tee mann
ghann vsturrehs.
3. Es äßmu weens Lohzeklis py tawu Meeſẜu / Par to es pree-
zayohs no Ꞩirdtz :/: No töw es nhe leekohs noſkirrtees / Nahwes
Mohkahs vnd bähdohs buhdams : Jebb es mirrſtu / tad es töw
mirrſtu / To muhſchigu dſiewoſchanu eſẜi tu mann / Ar tawu Nah-
wu attpirzis.
4. Kad tu no Nahwes aukſcham czehlees eſẜi / Tad es ẜawà Kap-
pà nhe pallickſchu :/: Tawa Däbbäſẜo Kahpſchana manns Preex gir /
Tahs Nahwes Jßbail tu warri payembt : Aiſto kur tu eſẜi / turr es
nahkſchu / Ka es muhſchige py töw dſiewo vnd äßmu / Tapehtz es
liexmodams aisbrautzu.
5. Nu brautzu es py JEſum CHriſt / Mannas Rohkas iß=ſteep-
dams :/: Nu ghullu es vnd duſẜu labb / Nhe weens Czillwähx warr
mann vsmohdenaht :/: Ka JEſus CHriſtus Deewa Dähls / Tas
atdarries mann tahs Debbeſẜes Durrwis / Vnd weddies eekſchan to
muhſchigu dſiewojchanu. Amen.
Auff meinen lieben GOTT.
VS mannu myļu Deewu / Czerreyu es czeeßdams bähdas vnd
Waidu / Tas warr mann allaſch peſtiet / no Nhelaim / Lixtu /
vnd Mohkahms / Mannu Nhelaim warr tas pahrwehrt /
Wiſẜas leetas ſtahw wiņja Rohkahs.
2. Jeb mann manni Ghräki kahrdena / Nhe ghribbu es tapehtz iſ-
ẜamiſt / vs Chriſtum ghribbu es czerreht / vnd tam ween ẜöw paļautees /
Tam es ẜöw padohmohß / Jeb dſiewodams jeb mirrdams.
3. Kad mann ta Nahwe nohſt jämm / Gir ta Mirrſchana man-
ni Augļi / vnd CHriſtus gir manna Dſiewiba / Tam es ẜöw padoh-
mohs / Es mirrſtu ſchodeen jeb riete / Mannu Dwehſẜel tas labbe
ghlabbohß.
3. Ock manns Kunx JEſu CHriſt / Katters tu tick rahme /
Mannis dehļ py Kruſtu eſẜi nomirris / Vnd mann to Däbbäſẜu att-
pirzis / vnd mums wiſẜeems ween lieds / To muhſchigu ſchälaſtibu.
4. Amen ick kattrà ſtundà / ẜacku es no Ꞩirrdtz dibben / Tu ghrib-
bätu mums waddiet / Kunx CHriſte allaſchien / Ka mehs tawu
Wahrdu / Muhſchige warram ſlahweht / Amen.
Jch weiß ein ewigs Himmelreich.
ES ſinnohß weenu muhſchigu Däbbäſſa=wallſtibu / Tha gir
iht krahßne darrita / Nhe no Ꞩuddrabu neds ẜarrkanu Säll-
tu / Ar Deewa Wahrdu muhräta.
2. Eekſchan to dſiewo Deewa Dähls / Tas Behrnings JE-
ſus CHriſtus / Vs kattru wiſẜa manna czerriba gir / Kamehr es py
to nahku.
3. Es äßmu weens nabbax Czeļļa=wiers / Buhß ſtaighaht ẜa-
wu czeļļu / Eekſchan to muhſchigu Tähwa Semm / Es luhdſcho
mann nhe attſtaht.
4. Ar mannu Aſẜini eſẜi tu attpeſtietz / Es myļo töw no Ꞩirdtz /
Eſẜi paczeetiex tawohß bähdohß / Es ghribbu parwehrt tawas ẜah-
pes.
5. Kad tu eſẜi Deewabiyatais / vnd ey py laiku / Py to ſwätu
Deewaghalldu / Wiſẜus tawus Ghräkus vnd Noſegummus / Es
nhe ghribbu wairs peeminneht.
6. Jeb no töw wiſẜi Czillwäki / Attkahp ſcheit wirſẜon Sem-
mes / Es ghribbu tow pa ẜahneem buht / Taws Preex vnd ghellbe-
ſchana tapt.
7. Raudaſchana by manns pirrmais Ballxnis / Ar Raudaſcha-
nu es peedſimmu / Ar Raudaſchanu näß mann attkall nohſt / Teems
Tahrpeems par Barribu.
8. Tomähr es ſinnu ka ſchy manna Meeſẜa / Eekſchan Kappu
nhe pallix / Paſtarà deenà no jaukeems Engeļeems / Vsmohdenata
py muhſchigu Preeku.
9. Turr palliedſi mums JEſus CHriſt / Katters muhſẜo dehļ
eſẜi mirris / Vnd mums ar tawu ruhktu Nahwu / To Däbbäſẜo=
wallſtibu attpirzis.
10. Laideeta mums wiſẜi lieds / Tam Kungam luhkt no Ꞩirdtz
dibben / Par ẜawu leelu lehnibu / czaur JEſum CHriſtum / Amen.
Ach wie elend iſt vnſer Zeit.
OCk ka behdiga gir muhſẜo dſiewoſchana / Scheitan wirſẜon
ſchahs Semmes :/: Ghann peepehſch tas Czillwähx peeghul-
lahß / Mums buhs wiſẜeems nomirrth: Scheitan eekſchan
ſchahs Wahrgoſemmes / gir wiſẜur Bähdi vnde Darrbs / Jeb töw
ghann labb ißdohdahs.
2. Ock Adama Krittums vnd Noſegummi / To wiſẜu vs mums
czehle :/: Ock Deews mahzi tu mums / Ka mehs to pareiſe attſieſtam:
Ka mehs tick ackli vnd ſtullbi äſẜam / patt Nhelaimes widdu buhda-
mi / Nhe gir tas leels brienums ?
3. Kunx Deews tu muhſẜo ghellbeſchana eſẜi / Tawu Palligu
mums ẜuhti :/: Aiſto tu tawus Ļaudis nhe aismirrſti / Kattri ẜöw
py töw ghreeſchahs: Ar tawu Gharru ſtahwi mums klaht / Weenu
ſchehligu Stundinyu arridſan dohd / czaur JEſum CHriſtum /
Amen.
XXVII.
Vom Begräbniß.
Mit Fried vnd Frewd ich fahr dahin.
AR Meeru vnd Preeku es brautſcho proyam / Eekſchan Deewa
Prahtu / Drohſcha gir manna Ꞩirrdtz vnd Prahtz / Weegla
vnd kluſẜa / Ka Deews mann ẜohliyis gir / Ta Nahwe gir
manns Meex tappis.
2. To darra CHriſtus patteeſẜa Deewa Dähls / Tas yhſtäns
Peſtitais / Kattru tu mann / O Kunx / eſẜi litzis rädſäht / Vnd mah-
zi paſiet / Ka tas äſẜohtz ta Dſiewiba vnd Peſtiſchana / Eekſchan bäh-
dahms vnd arridſan eekſchan mirrſchanu.
3. To eſẜi tu wiſẜeems paradiyis / Ar leelu ſchälaſtibu / Py tawu
Wallſtibu to wiſẜu paſẜaul / Litzis aitzeenaht / czaur tawu ſwähtu
dargu Wahrdu / Katters gir wiſẜahs mallahs attſkanneyis.
4. Wings gir ta Peſtiſchana vnd ſwäta ghaißma / Preekſchan
teems Paggaņeems / Apghaißmoht tohs kattri töw nhe paſieſt /
Vnd ghanniet / Wings gir tawo ļauſcho Jſraeļa / ſlawa / ghohtz /
Preex vnd Liexmiba.
Mitten wir im Leben ſind.
PAtt labbà dſiewoſchanà / Mums ta Nahwe ẜayämm :/: Kurr
mehs meckleyam kas pallieds / ka mehs ſchalaſtibu attrohdam /
Tas eſẜi tu Kunx weens / Muhſẜe Noſeegummi gir mums
ſchähl / Kattri töw Kunx apkaitenayuſchi gir / Swähtz Kunx Deews /
Swähtz warräns Deews / Swähtz ſchehligais Peſtitais / tu muh-
ſchiex Deews / Nhe leetz mums eeghrimbt / Eekſchan tahs ruhktas
Nahwes bähdams / Kyrie eleiſon.
2. Nahwes Widdu kahrdena / Mums tahs Elles Ryekle :/: Kas
ghribb mums no tahdeems bähdeems / Attkall atpeſtiet ? To darri tu
Kunx weens / ſchähl gir tawai ſchälaſtibai / Muſẜi Ghräki vnd leela
Waina: Swähtz Kunx Deews / Swähtz warräns Deews / Swähtz
ſchehligais Peſtitais / Tu muhſchiex Deews / Nhe laid mums iſẜami-
ſtees / Par to dſiļļu Elles Werrßmi / Kyrie eleiſon.
3. Widdu eekſchan Elles bailibas / muhſẜi Ghräki mums eedſänn :/:
Kurr buhs mums tad nobähkt / kurr mehs warram pallickt? Py töw
Kunx CHriſte ween / Tawu dahrgu Aſẜini eſẜi tu ißlehyis / Katters
par wiſẜu Ghräku ghann darra / Swähtz Kunx Deews / Swähtz
warräns Deews / Swähtz ſchehligais Peſtitais / tu muhſchiex Deews
Nhe laid mums no alloteeß / No to ihſtanu Titzibu / Kyrie eleiſon.
Nun laſtvns den Leib begraben.
NV laideeta mums to Mirroni aprackt / Par to nhe kahdu Jſ-
ẜamiſẜeſchanu turreht / Tas Jaunà=deenà attkal aukſcham
czellſẜeeß / vnd nhe ẜatruhdähtz preekſchan nahx.
2. Semme gir tas / vnd no tahs Semmes / Par Semm tas att-
kal taps / Vnd no tahs Semmes attkal aukſcham czellẜeeß / Kad
Deewa Baſune attſkannehs.
3. Wiņja Dwehſẜele dſiewo muhſchiege eekſchan Deewu / katters
to ſcheit aran tyhras ſchälaſtibas / No wiſẜeems Ghräkeems vnd No-
ſeegummeems / czaur ẜawu Dählu attpeſtiyis gir.
4. Wiņja Bähdi / Nhelaimiba vnd Waidi / Gir dabbuyuſchi
ẜawu labbu ghallu / Wings gir neſẜis Chriſti Naßtu / Gir nomirris
vnd dſiewo wehl.
5. Ta Dwehſẜele dſiewo beß wiſẜas ſuhdſeſchanas / Ta Meeſẜa
ghull ihs tai Jaunai=deeni / Kad Deews to apſkaidrohß / Vnd
muhſchigu Preeku tay dohß.
6. Scheit gir tas Czillwäx bähdohß biyis / Bett turr tas att-
kall attſpirx / Eekſchan muhſchigu Preeku vnd Liexmibu / Spiedehs
ka ta ſpohſcha Ꞩaule.
7. Nun attſtayam mehs to ſcheit ghulloht / Vnd eetham mah-
yahs ẜawu czeļļu / ẜattaiſẜameeß arridſan ar wiſẜu Ꞩirdi / Aiſto ta
Nahwe mums arridſan pee=eedt.
8. To pallieds mums CHriſtus muſẜo Preex / Katters mums
czaur ẜawu Aſẜini gir attpeſtiyis / No tha Wälla Spähku vnd muh-
ſchigu Mohku / Tam gir Ꞩlawa / Ghohtz vnd Patteitziba alla-
ſchien / Amen.
So laſt vns den Leib behalten.
TAd laideeta mums to Meeſẜu abghlabboht / Deews wiņja
Dwehſẜel ẜarrgahß / Tas ween to apghahdahß / Ka wings to
ſinna / bett mehs nhe prohtam.
2. To czerreyam mehs vnd titzam / Ka mehs wehl attkall redſeſ-
ẜimeeß / Kad mehs czellſẜimees no tahs Semmes / vnd preekſchan
Ꞩhodu nahxim.
3. Nu ghulli / teekams Deews töw vnd wiſẜeems / Ꞩawu Ba-
ſun lix dſirrdeht / Ka wiſẜo preekſcha taps laſẜietz / Kas ſläppäne gir
notitzis.
4. Deews palliedſi mums ka mehs wiſẜi lieds / Eekſchan Titzibas
dſiewoyam ghohdige / Pehtz preezige no ſchennenes ſkirram / Vnd
preekſchan tawu Ꞩohdibu labbe paſtahweyam / Amen.
Ein anders.
O JEſu wiſẜas Paſẜaules Eeẜakums / Nu eepreezini mums
kattri mehs noſkummuſſchi äſẜam / Czaur tawu ruhktu
Nahwu / Vnd palliedſi mums Kunx no wiſẜahms bähdams /
Ka mehs nhe ẜamaitayam / Kad mums buhß nomirrth / Kyrie
eleiſon.
Collecta beym Grabe.
O Wiſẜewallditais Kunx vnd Deews / Katters tu
mums czaur to Mutt tawa ſwähta Apustuļa Pa-
wila eſẜi mahziyis / ka mums par teems kattri eek-
ſchan CHriſto duß / nhe buhs bähdateeß : Mehs luhdſam
thöw / ka mehs ar wiſẜeems Titzigeems warram weßti
tapt eekſchan to muhſchigu Preeku / Kad taws Dähls
nahx Ꞩohdiet tohs dſiewus vnd Mirronus / czaur ta paſ-
ſcha tawa myļa Dähla muhſẜa Kungha JEſu CHriſti
ruhktu Mohkams vnd Nawu / Amen.
Ein anders.
O Wiſſewallditais Kunx vnd Deews / Katters tu
czaur to nomirrſchanu tawa Dähla tohs Ghrä-
kus vnd to Nahwu par ſmeeklu darriyis / vnd czaur wiņ-
ja Aukſchamczellſchanu to Nhenoſeedſibu vnd to muh-
ſchigu dſiewoſchanu attkal attneſẜis eſẜi / ka mehs no tha
Wälla Spähku attpeſtiti / vnd czaur to paſſchu Auk-
ſcham czellſchanu irr muhſẜai Meeſẜi no teems mirro-
ņeems attkal buhs vsmohdenatai tapt : Dohd mums
ſchehlige / Ka mehs to ſtippre vnd no wiſẜas Ꞩirdtz ti-
tzam / vnd to preezigu Aukſchamczellſchanu muhſẜas
Meeſẜas ar wiſẜeems ſwähteems dabbuith warram /
czaur to paſſchu tawu myļu Dählu muhſẜu Kunghu
JEſum CHriſtum / Amen.
XXVIII.
Vom Jüngſten Tage vnd ewigen
Leben.
Wacht auff ihr Chriſten alle / Wacht auff.
VSmohſteeta wiſẜi juhß Chriſtiti Ļaudis / Vsmohſteeta no
wiſẜas Ꞩirdtz :/: Eekſchan ſchahs Wahrgoſemmes / Vsmoh-
ſteeta / nu gir leels laix : Tas Kunx dries nahx / Ta deena me-
ckle ẜawu Wackaru / Tohs Ghräzeneekus tas paſuddenahß / Kas
warr preekſchan to paſtahweht.
2. Nauda / Mannta nhe darries labb / Mums nhe palliedſehß
muhſẜa Leppniba :/: Töw buhs to dries attſtaht / Kad nahk ta ruhk-
ta Nahwe : Jeb gir töw ghann jaux Waix / Jeb eſẜi tu jauns vnd
baggahtz / Deews warr töw peepehſche ẜamaitaht / Eekſchan weenu
Atzis mircklu.
3. Tapehtz wiſẜi juhß Chriſtiti Ļaudis / Kattri juhß ſcheitan koh-
pa eſẜeta :/: Attſtayeeta no juhſẜu Leppnibu / Vnd ghaideeta vs juhſ-
ẜu laiku : Ghribbaht juhß py Deewu dſiewoht / Tad meckleyeeta to
muhſchigu baggatibu / Wings jums to baggatige dohs / Vnd pal-
liedſehß no wiſẜahms bähdahms.
4. Deewa Wahrdtz gir mums dohtz / Aran tyhras ſchälaſti-
bas :/: Ka mums pehtz to buhß dſiewoht / Vnd ẜöw ẜattaiſẜiteeß:
Tad laideeta mums to wära jembt / Vnd ar to Ꞩirrdi py
to peelipt / Ja mehs no to attkahpſim / Tad äſẜam mehs paſu-
ſti.
5. Ock nhe buhtu tas peedſimmis / Katters Deewa Wahrdu
pullgo :/: Tas gir wiſkim ſamaitahtz / Vnd ſtaigha patt nacktz wid-
du : Pills Ghräko vnd Kauno / Vnd apſmey to Deewa Wahrdu /
O way tay leelai Nhelaimibai / Wiņja Dweſẜele palleek muhſchige
paſuſta.
6. Tohs Nabbagus kattri py jums dſiewo / Tohß vsluhkoyee-
ta :/: Tee jums leelu Kaunu darries / Kad juhß Ꞩohda ſtahwehſẜee-
ta : To buhs jums arridẜan ſinnaht / Ka Deews nhe gir no maxa-
tins / Vnd kas teems Nabbageems gir labbe darriyis / Tas turr ẜa-
wu Allgu dabbuis.
iſt gewißlich an der Zeit.
PAttees nu buhß tas ihſtäns laix / Ka Deewa Dähls atteeß :/:
Eekſchan ẜawas leelas Ghodibas / Ꞩohdiet tohß labbus vnd
ļaunus: Tad nhe buhs ſmeeſchanas laix / Kad wiſẜas leetas
ar Vgauni ẜaddex / Ka Peteris no to raxta.
2. Baſunes dſirrdehs attſkannam / Pa wiſẜas Paſẜaules ghal-
lam :/: Tad tudeļļ aukſcham czellſẜeeß / Wiſẜi Mirroņi peepehſch:
Bett tee kattri wehl dſiewi gir / Tohs tas Kunx weenà Atzes mirckly /
Parwehrtieß vnd attiaunahß.
3. Pehtz to weenu ghramatu nolaſẜies / Eekſchan kattru gir
eeraxtietz :/: Ko wiſẜi Czillwäki jauni vnd Wätzi / Wirſẜon Semmes
gir darriyuſchi: Tad ick kattris patteeſẜe / Dſirrdehs ko tas gir ſtra-
dayis / Kamähr tas ſcheit gir dſiewoyis.
4. O Way tam paſſcham katters gir / Ta Kungha Wahrdu
nitzinayis :/: Vnd ween wirſẜon Semmes rietohs vnd wackarohß /
Vs leelu Manntu domayis : Tas pattees itt plix pallix / Vnd buhs
ar to Wällu eedt / No CHriſto eekſchan Elles.
5. O JEſu palliedſi tanny laikà / Pehtz tawu ruhktu Mohku :/:
Ka es eekſchan ſchälaſtibas ghramatus / Eeraxtietz tohpu attraſts:
To es arridſan ſtippre titzu / Aiſto tu eſẜi to Wällu ẜohdiyis / Vnd
mannu Parradu nomaxayis.
6. Tapehtz eſẜi tu manns Aisbilldetais / Kad tu nu attkall att-
eeſẜi :/: Vnd laſẜi mann no tahs Ghramatas / Eekſchan kattras
tawi Titzigi raxtiti gir : Ka es ar ẜaweems Brahliſcheems / Eek-
ſchan tawu Däbbäſẜu warru ee=eedt / Kattru tu mums eſẜi nopell-
niyis.
7. Kad es / O Kunx / ẜawus Ghräkus apdohmayu / Mannas
Atztinyas Aſẜarus rittina :/: Bett kad es to muhſchigu Preeku ap-
dohmayu / Manna Ꞩirdtz liexmodameeß vslätz: Palliedſi Kunx / ka
es tawu Waigu / Warru redſeht ar ẜaweems Atzeems / Eekſchan to
muhſchigu dſiewoſchanu.
8. O JEſu CHriſt tu illge kahwe / Ar tawu Paſtaru=deenu :/:
Teems Czillwäkeems tohp ļohte bail / No leelu Waidu vs Sem-
mes: Nahtz tock / nahtz tock tu leels Ꞩohgis / Vnd attpeſty mums
ſchehlige / No wiſẜu ļaunu / Amen.
XXIX
Morgends Geſänge.
Jch danck dir lieber HERE / daß du.
ES patteitſchu töw myļais Kunx / Ka tu mann eſẜi paſẜargha-
yis :/: Tahda breeßmigà Nackty / Mann tick czeete ghulloht:
Ar Tumſẜibu parjämbtz / Ta lieds leelà lixtà / No kattras es ißbehd-
ſis äßmu / Tu Kunx vnd Deews mann palliedſeyi.
2. Es töw ghribbu patteickt vnd ſlahweht / O tu mans Deews
vnd Kunx :/: Eekſchan auxtu Däbbäſẜu / Vnd töw no Ꞩirdtz luhd-
ſcho / Scho deen mann arridſan paſẜarrgi / Pehtz tawu ſchehligu
Prahtu / Waddi mann tawà czeļļà / Vnd lohki mannu dabbu.
3. Ka es Kunx nhe noghreeſchohs / No tawu yhſtänu czeļļu :/:
Tas Wälls mann nhe parghluna / Mann malldiet wäſdams: Vs-
turri mann czaur tawu Lehnibu / To es töw no Ꞩirdtz luhdſcho /
Par Wälla Willtibu vnd blehdibu / Ar kattru tas prett man ſtahw.
4. To Titzibu mann arridſan dohd / Vs tawu Dählu JEſum
CHriſtum :/: Mannus Ghräkus mann arridſan peedohd / Scheitan
taggadien : To tu mann nhe aisleexi / Ka tu mann ẜohliyis eſẜi / Tam
by mannus Ghräkus nohſt jembt / Vnd peſtiet no to Naßtu.
5. To czerribu mann arridſan dohd / Kattra nhe leek ẜamai-
taht :/: Ta lieds to Chriſtitu myläſtibu / Prettieb to kas mann ļaun
darra : Ka es tam attkall labbe darru / Nhe mäcklädams mannu
Auglu / Vnd myļoyo to ka ẜöw paſſchu / Ka tas töw pa prahtam
gir.
6. Leetz mann tawu Wahrdu paſluddenaht / Schynny beßdee-
wigà Paſẜauleh :/: Vnd mann tawu Kallpu dehweht / Nhe byhtees
kahdu Warru neds Naudu: Kattra man dries warrätu no ghreeſt /
No tawas tyhras Taißnibas / Tu mann arridſan nhe noſkirr / No
tahs Chriſtitas Draudſibas.
7. Laid mann to Deenu pabeickt / Tawam Wahrdam par ſla-
wu :/: Ka es no töw nhe noſkirros / Lieds ghallam py töw palleeku:
Paſẜargi mannu Meeſẜu vnd Dwehſẜel / Vnd to Labbibu vs lauku /
Ko tu mann eſẜi dewiß / Tas gir wiß tawà Rohkà.
8. Kunx CHriſt ghodu es töw ẜacku / Par wiſẜu tawu labbe dar-
riſchanu :/: Ko tu mann wiſẜu mannu muhſchu / Wiſẜahdà weetà
paradiyis eſẜi : Tawu Wahrdu es ghribbu ghodaht / Tu weens eſẜi
labbs / Ar Tawu Meeſẜu mann ähdini / Ar tawu Aſẜini mann dſirrdini.
9. Töw ween peedärr tas Ghohtz / Töw ween peedärr ta Teick-
ſchana :/: Ta Attreepſchana töw palleek / Tu weens mums ſwehti:
Kad mehs meerige apghullam / Ar ſchälaſtibu py mums ſteidſeeß /
Dohd mums ar Titzibu prettie ſtahweht / Kad mums tas Wälls
vseedt.
Jch danck dir ſchon durch deinen.
ES patteitſchu töw krahßne / czaur tawu Dählu / O Deews
par tawu Lehnibu / Ka tu mann eſẜi ſchinny Nackty / Tick
ſchehlige paſẜargayis.
2. Kad es ghulleyu tick czeete / Ar Tumbſẜibu apjämbtz / No
wiſẜeems Ghräkeems mohzietz tappu / Kattrus es ẜawu muhſchu äß-
mu darriyis.
3. Tapehtz es luhdſchu no Ꞩirdß dibben / Tu ghribbätu mann
peedohd / Wiſẜus mannus Ghräkus kattrus es äßmu darriyis / Ar
ẜawu nicknu dſiewoſchanu.
4. Vnd gribbätu arridſan ſcho deen / Mann ghellbeht vnd
ẜarrgaht / Ka mann tas Waideneex nhe warr kaiteht / Ar ẜawu da-
ſchadu Willtibu.
5. Walldi tu mann pehtz tawu Prahtu / Nhe leeds mann Ghrä-
kohs ee=kriſt / Ka töw wiſẜa manna dſiewiba / Vnd wiß manns darrbs
warr pattickt.
6. Aiſto es pawähļu töw ẜawu Meeſẜu vnd Dwehſẜel / Vnd wiſ-
ẜas leetas tawà Rohkà / Eekſchan mannu Lixtu vnd Nhelaimibu
Kunx CHriſte tawu Palligu mann ẜuhti.
7. Ka tas Kunx ſchahs Paſẜaules / Mann nhe ſpähtu peewa-
reht / Aiſto ja tu mann nhe vsturri / Tad gir wings attkiels mann
piewillt.
8. Deewam ween auxtibà gir Ghohtz / Vnd wiņja weenigam
Dählam / Ta lieds arridſan tam ſwähtam Gharram / Katters
wallda Däbbäſẜo Wallſtiba.
Auß meines Hertzen grunde.
NO mannas Ꞩirrdtz dibben / Es patteitſchu vnd ſlaweyu töw :/:
Schinny Rietas ſtundà / ta lieds wiſẜu mannu muhſchu: Kunx
Deews tawà Wallſtibà / Töw par ghohdu vnd ſlawu / czaur
CHriſtum tawu Dählu / muhſẜu Kungu vnd Peſtitayu.
2. Ka tu mann eſẜi tick ſchehlige / Scho ißghayuſchu Nackty :/:
Par Breeßmibu vnd wiſẜadu Nhelaimibu / Paghlabboyis vnd ẜarr-
ghayis : Es luhdſchohs tick warren / Peedohd mann mannus
Ghräkus / Ar kattreems es wiſẜu muhſchu / Äßmu apkaitena-
yis.
3. Paſẜarrgi mann arridſan ſchehlige / Schodeen vnd allaſchien :/:
Par Wälla Willtibu vnd blehdibu / Par Ghräkeems vnd par kau-
nu : Par Vgguns vnd Vdensghräku / Par Nabbadſibu vnd par
Waidu / Par Wirrwehms vnd par Czeetumu / Par ļaunu peepeh-
ſchu Nahwu.
4. Mannu Meeſẜu / mannu Dwehſẜel / mannu dſiewibu / Man-
nu Ꞩeewu / Manntu / Ghohdu vnd Bährnus :/: Tawahs Rohkas
es pawehļu / Ta lieds mannu Ꞩaim : Taws Däwums vnd taws
Dahwans / Tähwu / Maht vnde Raddus / Mannus brahļus vnd
Paſieſtamus / Vnd wiß kaß mann gir.
5. Tawu Engeli leetz arridſan pallieckt / vnd nhe attkahpt no
mann :/: To Wällu nohſt wayaht / Ka tas ļauns Eenaidneex /
Scheiſchinny Wargoſemmeh / Ar ẜawu blehdibu mann nhe peewiļļ /
Meeſẜu vnd Dwehſẜelei bähdas nhe darra / Neds mann warrätu
Ghräkohß eeweſt.
6. Deewam es pawehļu / Aiſto wings wiſẜas leetas ſpeh :/:
Wings ſwehti mannu darrbu / Mannu dſirru vnd dohmaſchanu:
Aiſto wiņjam peedärr wiſẜas leetas / Mannu Meeſẜu / mannu dwehſ-
ẜel / mannu Dſiewoſchanu / Vnd ko tas mann girr dewis / Laid dar-
ra / ka tam paſſcham pattiek.
7. Vs to es ẜacku Amen / Nheneeka bähdadams :/: Deews lixeeß
wiſẜas leetas :/: Labbe pattickteeß : Nun iſteepyu es ẜawu Rohku /
Eeẜahku ẜawu darrbu / Py kattru Deews mann gir litzis / Eekſchan
mannas Aitzenaſchanas.
Jch dancke dir GOTT lieber HERR.
ES patteitſchu töw Deews myļais Kunx / Thäws eekſchan
Dabbäſẜo=wallſtibas :/: Czaur CHriſtum muhſẜu Widdetayu /
tawu weenu peedſimbtu Dählu / Par wiſſu tawu labbe=darri-
ſchanu / Vnd ka tu mann par Nhelaim / Scho Nackti eſẜi paſẜargha-
yis.
2. Es luhdſchu czaur Chriſtum tawu Dählu / Tu ghribbätu mann
peedohd :/: Kur es äßmu nhe pareiſe darriyis / Vnd luhdſchu töw turr
klaht arridſan / Tu ghribbätu mann ſchodeen paſſarghat / Ka mann
nhe neeka ļaun nhenoteek / Paſẜarrghi mann Kunx par Ghräkeems.
3. Eekſchan tawu Rohku es pawehļo / Deews Tähws tu mans
myligais Kunx :/: Mann wiſkim ar Meeſẜu vnd Dwehſẜel / Mannu
Paddomu vnd mannu ghodu / Taws ſwähtais Engelis mann paſ-
ẜarrgha / Ka man tas Wälls nhe pewarr / czaur JEſum Chri-
ſtum / Amen.
XXX.
Geſänge nach wir dem Eſſen.
O GOTT wir dancken deiner Güt.
O Deews mehs patteitzam tawai ſchälaſtibai / czaur Chri-
ſtum muhſẜu Kunghu :/: Par tawu leelu labbedarriſchanu /
czaur kattru tu allaſch barryo : Wiſẜas leetas kam ta Dwaſ-
ſcha gir / Jck kattru eſẜi tu ißbarroyis / Töw ẜackam ſlawu vnd ghodu.
2. Ka tu Kunx nu eſẜi ähdenayis / To Meeſẜu kattra ẜapuhſt :/:
Ta jemm to Dwehſẜel arridſan tawahs Weeſẜibahs / Kattra czaur
töw muhſcham nhemirrſt : Laid taws Wahrdtz gir wiņjas barriba /
Teekams ka ta tohs Preekus räds / Ka ta töw muhſchige warr pat-
teickt.
3. Slawa Ghohtz vnd Patteitziba allaſchien / Gir töw Tähws
eekſchan auxtibas :/: Katters tu mums no Ghräkeems atpeſti / czaur
to ſtippru Titzibu : Vs tawu weenu peedſimbtu Dählu / Ka mehs ar
to warram brahļi buht / Vnd töw muhſcham patteickt vnd ghodaht.
Amen.
HERR GOTT nu ſey gepreiſet.
KVnx Deews mehs töw ſlaweyam / Vnd ļohte patteitzam :/:
Tu eſẜi mums labbe barryoyis / Vnd dehwis labbu dſärumu /
Ka mehs warram tawu mylaſtibu attſiet / Vnd muhſẜu Ti-
tzibu eſtipprenaht / Ka tu eſẜi muhſẜo Deews.
2. Ja mehs to äſẜaam jämuſchi / Ar Kahribu vnd Nheghauſẜi-
bu :/: Czaur to mehs warrätam dabbuit / Tawu Dußmibu / O
Deews / Tad ghribbätu ſchehlige / O Kunx mums to peedoht / czaur
CHriſtum tawu Dählu.
3. Ta allaſchien vsbarryo / Kunx muhſẜo Meeſẜu vnd Dwehſ-
ẜel :/: Eekſchan CHriſto wiß peeghreeſt / Vnd eekſchan töw darriet
tauku / Ka mums tas Ahdins pahr=eedt / Vnd mehs ſtippre pallee-
kam czeeſdami / Vnd dſiewoyam muhſchige.
4. O Tähws wiſẜahs lehnibahs / ſwehtietz tohp taws Wahrdtz :/:
Laid tawai Wallſtibai py mums nahkt / Tawam Prahtam mums
darriet rahmus : Dohd Maiß / peedohd tohs Ghräkus / Nhe leetz
to Ꞩirrdi kahrdenaht / Peſty mums no wiſẜahms bähdams / Amen.
Dancket dem HERREN / denn Er iſt ſehr freundlich.
PAtteitzeeta tam Kungham / Aiſto tas gir ļohte myliex / Vnd
wiņja lehniba vnd Taißniba palleek muhſchige.
2. Ka tas mums ka weensweems ſchehliex vnd baggahtz Deews /
Mums Nabbagus Czillwähkus pee=ähdenayis gir.
3. Dſeedaht tam no Ꞩirdtz dibben ween liedſe / Slawa vnd Pat-
teitziba gir töw Tähwam muhſchige.
4. Katters tu mums ka kahtz baggahtz vnd laipnis Tähws /
Barryo vnd apgherb ẜawus nabbagus Bährnus.
5. Dohd / ka mehs töw pareiſe mahzam atſiet / Vnd pehtz töw
muhſchigu Radditayu muhſẜa Ꞩirdtz ſtahw.
6. Czaur JEẜum CHriſtum tawu wiſẜu myligu Dählu / Kat-
ters gir muſẜu Widdetais preekſchan töw tappis.
7. Tas pallieds mums wiſẜus py töw O Kunx Deews / Vnd
darra mums par Bährneems ẜawa Tähwa Wallſtibà.
8. Par ſlawu vnd ghohdu ẜawam ſwähtam Wahrdam / Kas to
ee=ghribbahs / tas warr ẜatziet no Ꞩirrdtz / Amen.
Lobet den HERREN.
TEitzeeta to Kunghu / teitzeeta to Kunghu / Aiſto tas gir ļohte
myliex / Ļohte krahßna gir muhſẜo Deewa teickſchana / Muhſ-
ẜo Deewa teickſchana / Wiņja Slawa gir jauka vnd myliga
ja=klauſẜa / teitzeeta to Kunghu / teitzeeta to Kunghu.
2. Dſeedaht weens prett ohtru / dſeedaht weens prett ohtru /
Tam Kungham ar patteickſchanu / Slawehyeeta to ar Kohklehms /
muhſẜu czeenigu Deewu / muhſẜu czeenigu Deewu / Aiſto tas gir war-
rans vnd no leelu ſpähku / Teitzeeta to Kunghu / teitzeeta to Kunghu.
3. Tas warr to Däbbäſẜu / Tas warr to Däbbäſẜu / Ar Paddeb-
beſẜeems apklaht / Tas dohd LeetuĻeetu wirß Semmes / kad tam paſẜcham
pattieck / Kad tam paſſcham pattieck / Tas leck Sahles aukt wirſẜon
auxteems ẜakalltuſcheems Kallneems / Teitzeeta to Kunghu / Teitzee-
ta to Kunghu.
4. Katters wiſẜai Meeſẜai / Katters wiſẜai Meeſẜai / ẜawu
barriba dohd / Teems Lohpeems ẜawu barryoſchanu ka Tähws
ghadadams / ka Tähws ghadadams / Teems jauneems Krau-
kļeems kattrito peeẜautz / Teitzeeta to Kunghu / Teitzeeta to Kun-
ghu.
5. Tam nhe gir labbs Prahtz / Tam nhe gir labbs Prahtz / Py to
Sirrgho ſtipprumu / Neds tam gir labbs Prahtz / Py to Wyro lee-
leems / py to Wyro leeleems / Tam gir labbs Prahtz py teems kattri
vs to ezerre / Teitzeeta to Kunghu / Teitzeeta to Kunghu.
6. Patteitzeeta tam Kungham / patteitzeeta tam Kungham Rad-
ditayam wiſẜo leeto / Tas Awohtz tahs dſiewibas no to ißtäck / no to
ißtäck / ļohte auxte no Däbbäſẜu no wiņja Ꞩirrdi / Teitzeeta to Kun-
ghu / teitzeeta to Kunghu.
7. O JEſu CHriſte / O JEſu CHriſte / Dähls ta wiſẜaaux-
taka / Dohd tu tawu ſchälaſtibu wiſẜeems labbeems Czillwäkeems /
wiſẜeems labbeems Czillwäkeems / Ka tee tawu Wahrdu warr muh-
ſchige ſlaweht / Amen / Teitzeeta to Kunghu / teitzeeta to Kunghu.
Nun laſt vns GOTT dem HERREN.
NV ghribbam mehs Deewam tam Kungham / Patteickt vnde
to ghodaht / Par wiņja leeleems Dahwaneems / Kattrus
mehs äſẜam dabbuyuſchi.
2. To Meeſẜu / to Dwehſẜel / to dſiewibu / Gir wings weens mums
dewis / Tohs arridſan paſẜarrgaht / Wings allaſch mohdriex gir.
3. Vsturreſchanu dohd wings tai Meeſẜai / Tai Dwehſẜelei
buhs mums arridſan pallickt / Jeb gir ghann lieds nahwes eewaino-
ta / No leeleems noſeeghummeems.
4. Weens Ahrſts gir mums dohdtz / Tas patz gir ta Dſiewiba /
CHRiſtus muhſẜo dehļ nomirris / Tas gir mums attkal atpeſti-
yis.
5. Wiņja Wahrdtz / Chriſtiba / Wackara=ähdins / Labbs girr
prett wiſẜu Nhelaim / Tas ſwähtz Gharrs eekſchan Titzibas / mahza
mums vs to paļļautees.
6. Czaur to gir mums peedohti Tee Ghräki / eeſkinkota ta dſie-
wiba / Debbeſẜies buhs mums dabbuit / O Deews / leelus dawa-
nus.
7. Mehs luhdſam tawu ſchälaſtibu / Tu ghribbätu mums jo-
proyam paſẜarrgaht / Mums leelus ar teems Maſeems / Tu myļomy o
mums no Ꞩirdtz.
8. Patturri mums eekſchan tahs Taißnibas / Dohd muhſchi-
gu Peſtiſchanu / Tawam Wahrdam par ſlawu / czaur JEſum
CHriſtum / Amen.
Danckt dem HERREN heut vnd alle zeit.
PAtteitzeeta tham Kungham ſchodeen vnd allaſchien / Leela gir
wiņja lehniba vnd ſchälaſtiba / Wiſẜu Meſẜu Wings barryo
vnd vsturr / Aiſto wiņja Raddiba tam pattiek.
2. Kad wiņja Waix par mums atſpied / Tas leetus vnd Raſẜa
to Semm apſlatzina / Tad augh wiſẜas lappas vnd Sahle / Ꞩawu
darrbu Wings dſänn beß mitteſchanas.
3. Kad wings atdarra ẜawu ẜchehligu Rohku / Tad augh par
pillu czaur wiſẜu Semm / Ka par to preezayahs ick=kattris / Nhe wee-
nam Czillwäkam neds lohpam kas peetruhxt.
4. Wiņjam nhe gir pa prahtam ſtippris Wiers / Neds leeliba
vnd ghreſniba wiņjam pattiek / Wings mieļo tho / Kas wiņju bie-
ſtahs / Kas vs wiņju czerre tam labb ißdohdahs.
5. Pattees tohp wings no mums ſlahwähtz / Kad wings mums
tick ſchehlige gir barroyis. O Tähws par tawu lehnibu / Patteitzam
mehs thöw muhſchige.
6. Ock Kunx dohd mums weenu labbu Ghaddu / To Labbibu
mums paghlabbo / Par Dahrgu laiku / baddu / Ꞩährgu vnd Kaŗ-
ŗu / Paſẜargi mums Kunx ſchinny laikà.
7. Muhſẜo mieļais Tähws tu eſẜi / Tapehtz ka Chriſtus muhſẜo
Brahlis gir tappis / Tadehļ vs thöw ween mehs zerreyam / Vnd
ghribbam töw ſlahweht muhſchige.
8. Ock palleetz py mums Kunx JEſu CHriſt / Ka tas nu Wa-
ckarrs tappis gir / Tawu Deewiſku Wahrdu to muhſchigu Swetz /
Nhelaid jo muhſcham py mums ißdſiſt.
Singen wir auß Hertzen grund.
MEhs dſiedam wiſẜi no Ꞩirdtz dibben / Slawädami
Deewu ar muhſẜu Mutt / Ka tas ẜawu ſchälaſtibu
mums gir paradiyis / Ta gir tas mums barryoyis /
Ka tas Lohpus vnd Puttnus barryo / Ta gir tas mums
arridſan dewis / Komehs taggad äſẜam ähduſchi.
2. Teitzam mehs to ka wiņja Kallpi / To buhs mums
darriet no teeſẜu / Atſiedami ka tas mums gir myļoyis / tam
Czillwäkam no ſchälaſtibas dohd / ka tas no Kauleems /
Meeſẜu vnd Ahdu / Krahßne gir kohpa ẜataiſẜietz / ka tas
tahs deenas ghaißmu räds.
3. Tudeļļ kad tas Czillwähx dſiewoht eeẜahk / Wiņja
Ähdens ghattaws gir / Eekſchan ẜawas Mahtes meeſ-
ẜahm / Gir tas krahßne ẜattaiſẜietz / Bett tas gir maß Behr-
nings / Tomähr nhe kahdu Wainu warr attraſt / Teekams
ka tas vs Paſẜaules nahk.
4. Deews gir to Semm ẜattaiſẜiyis / Nhe leek no Barri-
bas nhe neeka truhkt / Kallnu vnd Eeleyu wings ſlappina /
Ka teems Lohpeems ẜawa Sahle aug / No ſemmes Maiſe
vnd Wienu / Audſina Deews vnd dohd mums ghann / ka tas
Czillwähx ẜavu dſiewoſchanu vsturr.
5. Tam Vhdenim buhß Siwiß doht / Tohs leek Deews
ghalldu czellt / (a) Pauti no Puttneems dähti tohp /
Czahliſchi tohp no teems iß=pärräti / Teems buhß Czillwä-
ka barribam buht / Breeſchus / Lahtſchus / Wehrſchus /
Ahwis / Czuhkaß / Radde Deews vnd wings ween dohd.
6. Mehß patteitzam ļoht / vnd luhdſam to / Ka tas
mums dohd tahdu Prahtu / ka mehs to warram pareiſe ẜa-
praſt / Allaſch pehtz ẜawu prahtu dſiewoht / Wiņja Wahr-
du ļohte teickt / Eekſchan CHriſto beß mitteſchanas / Tad
dſeedam mehs to Patteitzibu pareiſe.
7. To Patteitzibu dſeedam mehs / O baggatz Deews
mehs patteitzam thöw / Ka tu mums lieds pillam eſẜi barr-
yoyis / Tawu lehnibu paradiyis / Par ſlawu vnd ghohdu
tawam Wahrdam / Ka mehs thöw allaſch patteickt war-
ram / Tad dſeedam mehs to Amen krahßne.
Den Vater dort oben.
TO Tahwu auxte äſẜoht / ghribbam mehs nu ſla-
weht / Katters mums ka bagghatz Deews / ſchehlige
barryoyis gir / Vnd CHriſtum wiņja Dählu / czaur
kattru mums wiß labbums nahk / no tahs Däbbäſẜa=wall-
ſtibas.
2. Ꞩatzidami pattees / Thöw peedärr ghohtz vnd ſla-
wa / Patteickſchana vnd ſkaidriba / O tu muhſchiex Deews /
Katters tu ẜöw paradais / Vnd mums ſchodeen ar tawu
dawanu / Labbe eſẜi baryoyis.
3. Vsjemm ſcho Patteitzibas Vpperi / O Tähws vnd
Radditais / Kattru mehs tawam Wahrdam darram / Eek-
ſchan CHriſto tawu Dählu / O leezees töw pattickt / vnd
laid tas ar ẜawu Nopällnu / Maxa prcekſchan mums wiſ-
ẜeems.
4. Nheneeka mehs warram ẜohliet / Ar ko buhtu att-
maxatina / Wiſẜa ſchälaſtiba vnd Myliba / Ko tu mums
eſẜi paradiyis / Ock ka warr wirſẜon Semmes / Thöw att-
kal ko attmaxaht / Aiſto töw jaw wiß peedärr.
5. O Kunx vsjemm Patteitzibu / Ar ſcho muhſẜu dſeeß-
mu / vnd peedohd kas wehl truhxt / ko mums by darriet /
O darri mums par tawus Bährnus / ka mehs ſcheit eek-
ſchan tawas ſchäläſtibas / vnd turr muhſchige dſiewoyam.
Zwey Ding O HERR bitt ich von Dir.
DJweyas leetas / O Kunx es luhdſcho no töw
Tohs tu mann nhe leexi / Teekams ka es ſchinny
Wahrgoſemmeh äſẜu / Vnd mann manna ſtundinja attjämm :/:
manna ſtundinja attjämm.
2. Nhepatteeſẜu Mahzibu / Ällkadeewibu / Jrr Mälli laid tahļ
no mannim buht / Nabbadſidu vnd baggatibu nhe dohd mann / To-
mährTowähr es ſcho wehl wairahk luhdſcho :/: Wehl wairahk luhdſcho.
3. Tick dauds ka wayaga gir dohd tai Meeſẜai / Ka es warru
barryoht Bärnus vnd Seewu / ka nhe kaß wayagga gir neds truhxt /
Neds arridſan pahr pahrem eyoht :/: Pahr pahrem eyoht.
4. Czittahd kad es par leeku pee=ähdeeß buhtu / Aißleektu es man-
nu Kunghu / Vnd ẜatzitu / Ko es bähdayu pehtz Deewu / Mann gir
ghann wiſẜas leetas :/: Mann gir ghann wiſẜas leetas.
5. Jeb kad Nabbadſiba mann peekahptu / Buhtu es eeẜahtzis
Sackt / Jeb czittad ar Ghräkeems meckleht Maiß / Beß Deewa
byſchanas / Ka daſſch darra :/: Ka daſſch darra.
6. Ta Kungha ſchäläſtiba darra baggate / Beß wiſẜu ghahdu /
jeb tu ghann Eekſchan tawas buhſchanas ſtippre ſtrahda / Vnd dar-
ri kas töw pawählähtz gir :/: Kas töw pawählähtz gir.
XXXI.
Abends Geſänge / ſich GOTT zu befehlen /
ehe man zu Bette gehet.
CHriſte der du biſt Tag vnd Liecht.
CHriſte katters tu eſẜi Deena vnd ghaiſſma / Preekſchan thöw /
Kunx nheneeka gir ſläppäns / Tu Tähwa ghaiſẜibas ſpoh-
ſchums / Mahzi mums pareiſe to czeļļu tahs Taißnibas.
2. Mehs luhdſam tawu Deewiſku ſpähku / Pagglabba mums
Kunx ſchinny Nackty / Paſẜarrgi mums no wiſẜu Nhelaimibu /
Deews Tähws tahs ſchälaſtibas.
3. Dſenn nohſt to ghrutu Meegu Kunx CHriſt / Ka mums nhe
kait tha Waideneeka Willtiba / Ta Meeſẜa laid palleek ſkieſta / Tad
äſẜam mehs no wiſẜu ghadaſchanu.
4. Kad muhſẜas Atzis aismeeg / Tad laid muhſẜas Ꞩirrdes vs
töw czerreht / Deewa labba Rohka mums pagglabbo / Vnd peſti
mums no to Ghräko Ꞩait.
5. Kunx Pagglabbotais tahs Chriſtitas Draudſibas / Laid buht
tawa palliga mums allaſch ghattawa / Palliedſi mums Kunx Deews
no wiſẜahms bähdahms / czaur taweems peezeems ẜarrkaneems
Matehms.
6. O Kunx attghadayees to ghrutu laiku / Eekſchan kattru ta
Meeſẜa ghuhſtita gir / To Dwehſẜel kattru tu eſẜi attpeſtiyis / To ee-
prezini Kunx JEſu.
7. Deewam Tähwam gir ghohtz vnd ſlawa / Ta lieds arridſan
ẜawam Dählam / Ta ſwähta Gharra ſchälaſtiba / Gir ar mums
muhſchige muhſcham / Amen.
Wir dancken dir O gütiger GOTT.
MEhs patteitzam töw / O lehniex Deews / Par tawu Thäwi-
ſku ſchälaſtibu / Ka mehs beß Nhelaimibas ſcho deenu / Jaw
äſẜam nu pabeighuſſchi.
2 . Ta Ꞩaule mums ẜawu ſpohſchumu attrauy / Ta Tumſẜiba
tahs Nacktz atteedt / Mehs luhdſam töw O muhſchiex ghaiſſchums /
Tu nhe ghribbätu no mums attſtaht.
3. Tas Wälls gir labpraht ar ẜawu Willtibu / Ka Släppka-
wi darra / Tumſẜibà / Prett wiņja ſpähku mehs nabbagi nhe warram
turrehtees / Tapehtz O Kunx / ſtahwi tu py mums.
4. Muhſſu Meeſẜu / Dwehſẜel / Manntu pagglabbo / Par
wiſẜeems Ghräkeems mums paſẜargi / Czaur tawo ſwähto Engeļo
drauds / Par Nhelaim mums ghulloht paſẜargi.
5. Vnd kad mehs ta äſẜam radditi / Ka mehs beß Meegu nhe
warram dſiewoht / Vnd tu no tawas lehnibas / To Nackti par
Duſẜeſchanu eſẜi ee=litzis.
6. Tad dſenn no mums wiſẜu Ꞩirrdes ẜahp / Welltu ghadaſcha-
nu vnd nheghauſẜibu / Vnd kas wehl wairahk kahweht warr / Py
labbas Aismickſchanas.
7. Pehtz kad nahk ta Rietasſtunda / Mehs attkal czeļļameß
attſpirguſchi vnd wäſẜäli / Vnd kad mehs töw patteickuſchi äſẜam /
Attkal py muſẜu darrbu eet warram.
8. Kunx CHriſt nhe aismirrſti muhſẜo / Kad tu turrähſẜi ẜawu
Ꞩohdu / Vsmohdini mums tad py tawas Wallſtibas / Kattra pal-
lix muhſchige / Amen.
CHriſt der du biſt der helle Tag.
CHriſte tu eſẜi ta ſkaidra Deena / Preekſch töw ta Nacktz nhe warr
pallickt / Tu atſpied mums no to Tähwu / Vnd mahzi mums
no to ghaiſſchumu.
2. Ock mieļais Kunx paſẜarrgi mums / Schinny Nackty par to
nicknu Eenaidneeku / Vnd laid mums eekſchan töw duſẜeht / Ka
mums tas Wälls nhe warr kaiteht.
3. Jeb muhſẜas Atzis aiſmeeg / Tad leetz tomähr to Ꞩirrdi moh-
drigu buht / Turri par mums tawu labbu Rohku / Ka mehs nhe krie-
tam eekſchan kaunu vnd Ghräku.
4. Mehs luhdſam töw Kunx JEſu CHriſt / Paſẜarrgi mums
no to Wälla Willtibu / Katters allaſch pehtz muhſẜu Dwehſẜel
ghrahpſta / Ka tas mums nhe warr peewalldiet.
5. Jo mehs äſẜam tawa Mannta / atpirrckti czaur tawu ſwähtu
Aſẜini / Tas by ta muhſchiga Tähwa Paddoms / Kad tas töw
mums eeſkingkoya.
6. Pawehl tam Engeļam ka tas nahk / Tawus Ļaudes paſẜarr-
gaht / Dohd mums tohß krahßnus Ꞩarrgus / Ka mehs ta Wälla
dehļ duſẜeht warram.
7. Tad ghullam mehs tawà Wahrdà / Ka nu tee Engeļi py
mums gir / Tu ſwähta Triaidiba / Mehs teitzam töw muhſchige /
Amen.
Collecten.
Gemeine Collecte:
O Wiſẜewalldiex Deews / muhſchiex Tähws /
katters tu eſẜi weens Paglabbotais wiſẜo to /
kattri vs töw czerreh / bes tawas ſchälaſtibas
nhe warr nhe weens / neds ſpeh ko darriet / dohd
mums tawu ſchälaſtibu baggatige / ka mehß czaur tawu
ſwähtu Eedoſchanu dohmayam kas labb gir / vnd czaur
tawu Palligu arridſan pabeidſam / czaur JEſum CHri-
ſtum tawu myļu Dählu muhſẜu Kunghu / katters ar töw /
vnd to ſwähtu Gharru dſiewo vnd wallda weens pat-
tees Deews allaſchien vnd muhſchige / Amen.
Ein ander.
O Wiſẜewalldiex Deews / muhſchiex Tähws / no
kattru mehß allaſchien wiſẜu labbumu pahreyoht
dabbuyam / vnd ickdeenas no wiſẜu Nhelaim ſchehlige
pagglabbohti tohpam. Mehß luhdſam töw no Ꞩirdtz
dibben / dohd mums ka czaur tawu Gharru ſcho wiſẜu ar
ſtippru Ꞩirrdi vnd patteeſẜu Titzibu mehß attſieſtam / ka
mehß tawu leelu lehnibu vnd ſchälaſtibu / ſcheitan vnd
turr muhſchige patteitzam vnd ſlaweyam / czaur JEſum
CHriſtum /
Vor gemeine Noht.
O Wiſẜewalldiex Kunx / ſchehliex Tähws / kattram
to nabbago Ghrehzeeneeko Nahwe nhe patiek / vnd
nhe leetz tohß arridſan labpraht paſuſt / bett ghribbi ka tee
attghreeſchahß vnd dſiewo : Mehß luhdſam töw no
Ꞩirdtz dibben / tu ghribbätu to nopellnitu Ꞩohdu muhſẜo
Ghräko ſchehlige no mums nowehrſt / vnd mums jopro-
yam tawu ſchälaſtibu doht / ka mehß weenu Labbaku dſie-
woſchanu eeẜahkt warram. Czaur JEſum Chriſtum ta-
wu mylu Dählu muhſẜu Kunghu / katters ar töw vnd to
ſwähtu Gharru dſiewo vnd wallda weens pattees
Deews allaſchien vnd muhſchige / Amen.
Vor die gemeine Chriſtenheit.
O Wiſẜewalldiex Deews / ſchehliex Tähws / katters
tu czaur tawu ſwähtu Gharru to wiſẜu Chriſtitu
Draudſibu ſwehti vnd walldi / Packlauſẜi muhſẜu Luhk-
ſchanu / vnd dohd ſchehlige / ka ta ar wiſẜeems ẜaweems Lo-
zekļeems eekſchan ſkieſtu Titzibu czaur tawu ſchälaſtibu
töw kallpo / czaur JEſum Chriſtum /
Eine gemeine Collect.
O Wiſẜewalldiex Deews / ſchehliex Tähws / katters tu
to behdigo Nopuſchanu nhe nitzini / vnd to noſkum-
muſcho Ļauſcho ghaidiſchanu nhe leeds / Vsluhko vs
muhſẜu Luhkſchanu / kattru mehß töw muhſẜahß bähdahßpreekſch-
preekſch näſẜam / vnd paklauſẜi mums ſchehlige / ka wiß kas
mums no Wällu vnd Czillwäkeems prettie ſtahw / kau-
nà tohp / vnd pehtz tawu Prahtu tahß ſchälaſtibas ißdäll-
däti / ka mehß no wiſẜu kahrdenaſchanu ißpeſtiti / töw eek-
ſchan tawas Draudſibas patteitzam vnd töw allaſchien
ſlaweyam / czaur JEſum CHriſtum /
Für Friede.
O Wiſẜewalldiex Deews / muhſchiex Tähws / weens
Konings tahß ghohdibas / vnd Radditais Debbes
vnd Semmes / czaur kattra Gharru wiſẜas leetas wall-
ditas / czaur kattra ißredſeſchanu wiſẜas leetas ißttaiſẜietas
tohp / katters tu eſẜi weens Deews tha Meera / no kattru
wiſẜa Weenaidiba py mums nahk : Mehß luhdſam töw /
tu ghribbätu mums muhſẜus Ghräkus peedoht / vnd ar
tawu Deewigu Meeru vnd Weenaidibu apdahwenaht /
ka mehß biedameeß vnd trieſẜädami tawam Wahrdam
kallpoyam / vnd tu allaſchien no mums warrätu teicktz
tapt / czaur JEſum CHriſtum /
Eine andere Collect für Friede.
O Deews tu Eeſtaditais tha Meera / vnd Myļotais
tahß Myläſtibas / kas töw atſieſt tas dſiewo / kas
töw kallpo tas wallda : Pagglabbo tawus Ļaudis / paſ-
ẜarrgi tohß par wiſẜu vseeſchanu ſwäſſcho Tauto / ka
mums to Waideneeko dehļ nhe wayaga bytees / kattri
mehß ẜöw vs tawu ghellbeſchanu paļauyamees / czaur
JEſum CHriſtum /
Noch eine andere für Friede.
O Wiſẜewallditais / muhſchiex Deews / ſchehliex
Tähws / no kattru wiſẜa ſwähta eegribbeſchana /
wiß labbs Paddohms / vnd labbi darrbi attnahk / dohd ta-
weems Kallpeems to Meeru / kattru ta Paſẜaule nhe ſpeh
doht / ka muhſẜas Ꞩirrdes vs tawu Wahrdu pahdoh-
dahß / vnd mehß tick illge ka mehß dſiewoyam / kad wiſẜa
breeßmiba to Tauto dehļ attkahpuſẜi gir / czaur tawu
Paſẜarrgaſchanu preezigi vnd kluſẜi warram buht:
Czaur JEſum CHriſtum /
ut ſuprà.
Wieder die Peſtilentz.
O Wiſẜewallditais muhſchiex Deews / ſchehliex
Tähws / tu ſinni kada wahja nabbaga leeta mehß
äſẜam / Nhe attmaxa mums ka mehß ar muhſẜu wahju
Titzibu vnd leelu Nhepatteitzibu par tawu ſwahtu Wahr-
du / äſẜam nopellniyuſchi / darri tu mums labbus / vnd
ſtipprini muhſẜu Titzibu / vnd abſchäloyees par mums /
ẜohdi muhſẜus Ghräkus ſchälodams / vnd jemm no mums
ſchehlige to Riext to Mehŗatrummo / ka taws nabbax
Pullzings nhe tohp ißkaiſẜietz / vnd ka tawi Prettibneeki
nhe preezayahß par muhſẜu wahju Titzibu / vnd tapehtz
tawu Wahrdu vnd Ꞩohdibu neewa / To dohd mums tu
wiſẜo ſchehliex Tähws / czaur JEſum Chriſtum tawu my-
ļu Dählu muhſẜu Kunghu / katters ar töw vnd to ſwähtu
Gharru weens pattees Deews dſiewo vnd wallda alla-
ſchien vnd muhſchige / Amen.
Für die Früchte der Erden.
O Wiſẜewalldiex Kunx Deews / däbbäſẜo Tähws /
katters tu czaur tawu muhſchigu Wahrdu wiſẜas
leetas raddiyis eſẜi / ſwahti vnde vsturri. Mehß luh-
dſam töw / ka tu tawu muhſchigu Wahrdu / muhſẜu Kun-
ghu JEſum CHriſtum / mums gribbätu mahziet paſiet /
vnd eekſchan muhſẜams Ꞩirrdehms eeſtattieth / czaur
kattru mehß pehtz tawas ſchälaſtibas czeenige warram
dabbuit / tawu Swähtumu par wiſẜu Ꞩähklu wirſẜon
Semmes / vnd kas mums wiß wayaga gir py Meeſẜas
vsturreſchanas / vnd tahdas Dahwanas tawam Dee-
wiſkam Wahrdam par ſlawu / vnd muhſẜam Tuwakam
par labbu jembt / czaur JEſum CHriſtum /
Für alle Weltliche Obrigkeit.
O Wiſẜewalldiex Deews vnd ſchehliex Tähws /
eekſchan kattra Rohkams wiſẜo Czilläwko ſpähx
vnd Walldiſchana / no töw eeſtadita / vnd eelickta par
Ꞩohdu to ļauno vnd par glabboſchanu to labbo Ļauſcho /
Eekſchan kattra Rohkams arridſan gir wiſẜa Teeſẜa tahß
Semmes / Mehß luhdſam töw / vsluhko ſchehlige vs
muhſẜu czeenigu Leelkungu vnd Koningu / vnd vs wiſ-
ẜeems Kungeems / vnd vs wiſẜeems Rahtes vnd Run-
naskungeems ſchahß Semmes (Pillis) vnd vs wiſẜeems
ghodigeems Wirſẜeneekeems : Ka tee to paſẜauligu Soh-
bänu / kattru tu teems eſẜi pawehleyis / pehtz tawu Prah-
tu vnd pawehleſchanu näſẜa / Abghaißmo vnd vsturri
tohß py tawu Deewigu Wahrdu / dohd teems / myļais
Kunx / ghuddribu vnd Ꞩappraſſchanu / vnd meerigu
Walldiſchanu / ka tee ẜawus Ļaudis eekſchan Meeru /
Weenaidibu vnd labbu ẜadderreſchanu glabboht vnd
walldiet warr. Dohd teems / o Kunx muhſẜas Peſtiſcha-
nas / illge dſiewoht / ka mehß appackſchan wiņjo Wallſti-
bas tawu deewigu Wahrdu / lieds ar teems ſwehtiet vnd
ſlaweht warram / czaur JEſum CHriſtum /
Wieder die Anfechtung.
O Wiſẜewalldiex Deews / muhſchiex Tähws / weens
Eepreezetais to Noſkummuſcho / weens ſpähx to
Wahyo / Leetz preekſchan tawu Waighu nahkt to Luhkſcha-
nu wiſẜo to / kattri eekſchan bähdeems vnd kahrdenaſcha-
nas töw peeluhds vnd ẜautz / ka ick=kattris nomaniet vnd
py ẜöw attrohd tawu Palligu vnd klaht ſtahwehſchanu
bähdalaikà / czaur Jeſum Chriſtum /
Für die Diener Göttlichs Worts.
O Wiſẜewalldiex ſchehliex Deews / vnd Tähws muhſ-
ẜa Kungha JEſu CHriſti / katters tu mums ſtippre
pawehleyis eſẜi / ka mums töw buhß luhkt par Darrbe-
neekeems tawà Druwà / tas gir / par labbeems Mahze-
tayeems tawa Wahrda : Mehß luhdſam tawu beßdibbe-
nigu ſchälaſtibu / Tu ghribbätu mums labbus Mahzeta-
yus vnd Kallpus tawa Deewiga Wahrda ẜuhtiet / vnd
teems paſẜcheems tawu ſwähtu Wahrdu eekſchan Ꞩirdtz
vnd Muttes eedoht / ka tee tawu pawehleſchanu peetitzige
vnd pehtz tawu Prahtu darra / vnd nheneeka mahza kas
prettie tawu Wahrdu buht warr / ka mehß czaur tawu
muhſchigu ſwähtu Wahrdu pamahziti / barryohti / eepree-
zenati vnd eeſtipprenati tohpam / vnd darram kas töw
patiek vnd mums labb warr buht / czaur JEſum Chri-
ſtum tawu myļu Dählu muhſẜu Kunghu / katters ar töw
vnd to ſwahtu Gharru weens pattees Deews dſiewo
vnd wallda allaſchien vnd muhſchige / Amen.
Ein Gebet in Peſtilentz zeiten.
O Muhſchiex / wiſẜewalldiex Deews / däbbäſẜo Tähws /
kapehtz eſẜi tu tick barrx vnd dußmiex vß mums /
vnd vs tahms Ahweems tawas ghannibas.
Ock Kunx muhſẜi Noſegummi gir to ghann nopellni-
yuſchi / ka tu mums tick ghauſche ſchaut / Aiſto muhſẜa
Nheklauſẜiba gir jo leela / ar kattru mehß prettie töw
Ghräkoyuſchi äſẜam.
Muhſẜus Noſegummus leezees tu preekſchan töw /
muhſẜus nheſiņņus Ghräkus eekſchan ghaißmas preek-
ſchan tawu Waighu.
Tapehtz iß=ẜackam mehß töw muhſẜus Ghräkus / vnd
nhe ſlepyam töw muhſẜus Noſegummus.
Bett attghadayees Kunx tawas ſchälaſtibas / vnd tawas
lehnibas / kattra no Eeẜakum̃u pirms paſẜaules biyuſẜi gir.
Aiſto tu eſẜi jo ar ſkaidreems Wahrdeems ſwehre-
dams ẜatziyis :
Tick teeſcham ka es dſiewoyo / nhe pattiek mann ta
Nahwe ta nabbaga Ghrehzeneeka : Bett ka tas attgree-
ſchas vnd dſiewo.
Eſẜi mums ſchehliex Deews / eſẜi mums ſchehliex:
Aiſto vs töw pallaiſchahß ẜöw muhſẜa Dweſẜele / vnd ap-
packſchan to ähnu tawo Spahrno gir mums Paglabhp-
ſchana / teekams ta Nhelaime pahreet.
Steidſees Deews mums peſtiet / Kunx nahtz nahk-
dams mums palliedſeht.
Kunx katters tu czittu reis arridſan eſẜi wiſẜu tawu
Dußmibu nohſt mettis / vnd ẜöw ghreeſees no to bahrſ-
ẜibu ẜawas Dußmibas / Eepreezini mums / Deews
muhſẜo Peſtitais / vnd attlaidees no tawas Nheſchäla-
ſtibas par mums.
Kunx parrahdi mums tawu ſchälaſtibu / vnd pal-
liedſi mums.
Attpeſti mums muhſẜas Ꞩeewas / muhſẜus Bähr-
nus vnd Ꞩaim / muhſẜuswuhſẜus Kaimiņņus vnd Draugus / no
wiſẜu ļaunu / vnd to nicknu Ꞩährgu vnd Nheweſẜelibu.
Nhe leetz mums ißbietees par teems Schauſſcha-
leems kattri nackties pahreet / par tahms bulltahms / kat-
tri Deenà ſkraida / par to Ꞩährgu kattra Deenas widdu
ẜamaita.
Nhe leetz mums kadu ļaun notickt / neds kahdai
Ꞩährgai py muhſẜams buhdams peeſtahtees. Pawehl
tawam Engeļam / ka tas mums paſẜarrga vs wiſẜu muhſ-
ẜu czeļļu.
Pilldini mums ſchehlige ar Weſẜelibu / vnd rahdi
mums tawu Peſtiſchanu.
Par nicknu peepehſchu Nahw paſẜarrgi mums mie-
ļais Deews vnd Kunx.
Eeſiemo ar tawu Ꞩirrdtzmieliga Dähla muhſẜa
Kungha JEſu Chriſti Aſẜini muhſẜas Ꞩirrdes / ka tas
Mehrdehtais Engels mums czätzen eet.
Eeſiemo muhſẜas Dwehſẜeles ar to Spähku ẜawa
wißſwähta Kruſta / vnd Nahw / ka mums nhekada Nhe-
laimiba nhenoteek.
Czaur tawa Dähla Kruſtu vnd Nahwu / palliedſi
mums mieļais Kunx vnd Deews.
Ꞩacki vs to Ꞩamaitatayu / jaw ghann gir / Attrau
ẜawu Rohku.
Bett ja mums tad pehtz tawu labbu prahtu no
ſchennenes eet buhß / vnd py muhſẜeems Tähweems ẜac-
krahteems tapt / Tad laid tas palleek muhſẜo pehdeis
Wahrtz / ka mehs ẜackam : Eekſchan tawu Rohku paweh-
ļam mehs muhſẜu Dwehſẜel / Tu eſẜi mums attpeſtiyis /
Kunx tu peetitziegs Deews.
Packlauſẜi mums mieļais Kunx vnd Deews / aiſto
tu eſẜi jo muhſẜo Tähws.
Abſchäloyees töw par mums / aiſto tu eſẜi jo muhſẜo
Eepreezetais vnd Palliex eekſchan bähdahms.
Paſẜarrgi mums / aiſto tu eſẜi jo weens Wißſpähziex
Deews / nhe ſtumm mums wiſchſkim nohſt / aiſto tu eſẜi
jo ſchähliex / rahms vnd no leelas lehnibas.
Eepreezini ar tawu ſwähtu Gharru wiſẜus noſkum-
muſchus Ꞩirrdes / dſeedini wiſẜus Nheweſẜeļus / jemm ta-
wà ghlabboſchanà / kattri tohß no Ꞩirrtz ẜarrga / ghauſẜi-
ni vnd ſahtini wiſẜus labbus Ļaudis / kattri par teems
ghada / vnd ẜawas ſchähligas Rohkas attwerr.
Tad ghribbam mehs töw teickt / tick illge ka mehs
dſiewoyam / vnd tawu leelu lehnibu ſlaweht / tick illge
mehs ſcheitan äſẜam / vnd töw muhſchige dſeedaht / Hal-
lelujah / Hallelujah / Amen.
Pſalmen Davids / ſo an Sontagen vnd
Wercktagen in der Kirchen zu Riga gebrau-
chet oder Geſungen werden.
Der erſte Pſalm.
LAbb tam / kas nhe ſtaigha eekſchan to Beßdeewigo Runnaß /
neds minn vs to Zeļļu to Ghräzeneeko / neds ẜehſch kur tee
Mehditayi ẜehſch.
2. Bett gribbahs to Baußlu tha Kunga / vnd runna no ẜawu
Baußlu deenas vnd nacktis.
3. Tas gir ka kahtz kohx däſtietz py teems Vhdens Vppeems /
katters ẜawus Augļus näß ẜawà laikà / vnd winya Lappas nhe ẜa-
wieſt / vnd ko darridams tas ißdohdahs.
4. Bett tha nhe gir tee Beßdeewigi / bett ka Pällawas / kattrus
tas Wehſch ißpuhſch.
5. Tapehtz nhe palleek tee Beßdeewigi Ꞩohdà / neds tee Ghrä-
zeneeki eekſchan to Taißno Pullku.
6. Aiſto taß Kunx paſieſt to czeļļu to Taißno / bett to Beßdee-
wigo czellſch ißniext.
Ghohtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd tam ſwäh-
tam Gharram / ka no Eeẜakumu gir biyis / vnd palleek muhſcho
muhſcham / Amen.
Der ander Pſalm.
KApehtz tracko tee Paggaņi / vnd tee Ļaudis runna tick wellte?
2. Tee Koninyi eekſchan Semmes ſpreeſchahß / vnd tee
Kunghi ẜarunnayahß kohpa / prettie to Kunghu vnd ẜawu
Swaidietu?
3. Laideeta mums ẜarauſtiet winyo Ꞩaiteß / vnd no mums meſt
winyo Wirrwes.
4. Bett kas Debbeſẜies dſiewo / ſmeyahß to / vnd tas Kunx meh-
di tohß.
5. Wings weenreis ar teems runnhaß ẜawohß dußmohß / vnd
ar ẜawu Barrgu wings tohß beedinahs.
6. Bett es äßmu mannu Koninyu ee=zehliß / vs mannu ſwähtu
Kallnu Zion.
7. Es ghribbu no tahdu weenu Wies mahziet / ka tas Kunx
vs mann ẜatziyis gir / Tu eſẜi mans Dähls / ſchodeen äßmu es töw
dſimmis.
8. Praſẜi no mann / tad ghribbu es töw tohß Paggaņus par
Bährnamantu doht / vnd tahs Paſẜaules ghallus par ihſtänu paſ-
ſchu Manntu.
9. Töw buhß tohß ar dſällſa Riext ẜaſẜiſt / ka Pohdus buhß töw
tohß ẜadauſiet.
10. Tad leezeetees nu raditees juhß Koninyi / vnd leezeetees
mahzitees juhß Ꞩohgi wirſẜon Semmes.
11. Kallpoyeeta tam Kungam bydammees / vnd preezayeetees
trieſẜädammi.
12. Skuhpſtaita to Dählu / ka tas nhe dußmo / vnd juhs ẜa-
maitaht vs to czeļļu / Aiſto winja Dußmiba peepehſch ee=dexees / bett
labb wiſẜeems / kattri vs to zerreh.
Ghohtz gir tam Thäwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd tam ſwäh-
tam Gharram / Ka no Eeẜakumu gir biyis / vnd palleek muhſcho
muhſcham / Amen.
Der dritte Pſalm.
Weena Dſeeßma Dawida / kad wings bähdſe preekſchan ẜa-
wu Dählu Abẜolon.
OCk Kunx / ka gir mann tick Dauds Enaideneeki / vnd ſtahw
tick dauds prettie mann.
2. Dauds ẜacka no mannas Dwehſẜeles / tai nhe gir nhe
kahtz Palliex py Deewu / Sela.
3. Bett tu Kunx eſẜi tee Ällkona=Bruņņi preekſchan mann / vnd
kas mann ghoda zeļļ / vnd mannu Ghallwu vszeļļ.
4. Es peeẜautſcho ar mannu Balxni to Kungu / tad paklauſẜa
Wings mann no ẜawu ſwähtu Kallnu / Sela.
5. Es ghullu vnd duſẜu / vnd vsmohſtohs / aiſto tas Kunx turr
mann.
6. Es nhe bieſtohs par dauds Ꞩimbt=tuxtoſcheems / kattri
prett mann apẜähdahs.
7. Zellees aukſcham Kunx / vnd palliedſi mann manns Deews /
aiſto tu ſweed wiſẜeems manneems Eenaidneekeems vs Waighu / vnd
ẜadauſi to Beßdeewigo Sohbus.
8. Py to Kungu palliedſiba gir attraſtina / vnd tawa ſwehtiba
par taweems Ļaudeems / Sela.
Ghohtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd
etc.
Der vierdte Pſalm.
Weena Dſeeßma Dawida / preekſcha dſeedaht vs Kohklehms.
PACklauſẜi mann / kad es ẜautzu / Deews mannas Taißnibas /
katters tu mann eepreezini bähdahs / eſẜi mann ſchähliex / vnd
packlauſẜi mannu Luhkſchanu.
2. Mieļi Kunhgi / czeek illghe buhß mannai ghodai nitzinatai
tapt? Ka mieļoyeeta juhß tohs niekſchkus tick ļohte / vnd tohs
Mällus tick labpraht? Sela.
3. Atſieſteeta tock ka tas Kunx ẜawus Swähtus briniſke wad-
da / taß Kunx dſirrd / kad es to peeẜautzu.
4. Dußmoyeeta juhs tad nhe Ghräkoyeeta / Runnayeeta ar
juhſẜeems Ꞩirrdeems vs juhſẜu Ghulltu / vnd ghaideeta / Seela.
5. Vppereyeeta Taißnibu / vnd zerreeta vs to Kunghu.
6. Dauds ẜacka / ka warrätu mums ſchiß rahdiet kas labb gir?
Bett Kunx pazell par mums to Ghaißmu tawa Waigha.
7. Tu eepreezini mannu Ꞩirrdi / Jebſche winjeems ghann dauds
Wiena vnd Labbibas gir.
8. Es ghullu vnd duſẜu itt ar meeru / Aiſto tu Kunx weens pal-
liedſi mann / ka es beß bailes dſiewo.
Ghohtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd
etc.
Der 25. Pſalm.
Weena Dſeeßma Dawida.
PEhtz töw Kunx illgoyas mann / Mans Deews es czerru vs
töw / Nhe laid mann kaunà tapt / ka manni Eenaidneeki par
mann nhe preezayahs.
2. Aiſto nhe weens tohp kaunà kas töwis ghaida / bett kaunà
buhs teems tapt / tee nickni Neewatayi . (
vel
Nitzinatayi.)
3. Kunx rahdi man tawu zeļļu / vnd mahzi man tawas Pähdas.
4. Waddi mann eekſchan tawas Teeſẜibas / vnd mahzi mann /
Aiſto tu eſẜi tas Deews kattres mann pallieds / Jckdenas es töw
ghaidu.
5. Attmini Kunx tawas Schälaſtibas vnd tawas Lehnibas /
kattra no Paſẜaules Eeẜakummu biyuſẜi gir.
6. Nhe peeminn tohs ghräkus mannas Jaunibas vnd mannu
Pahrkahpſchanu / Bett peeminn mannis pehtz tawas Schälaſtibas /
tawas lehnibas dehļ.
7. Tas Kunx gir labbs vnd rahms / tapehtz pamahza tas tohs
Ghrehzeneekus vs to zeļļu.
8. Tas wadda tohs Nabbagus pareiſe / vnd mahza teems Nab-
bageems ẜawu zeļļu.
9. Tee Zeļļi ta Kunga gir Schälaſtiba ween vnd Teeſẜiba /
Teems kattri winya Ꞩaliedſenaſchanu vnd Leezibu turr.
10. Tawa Wahrda dehļ / Kunx eſẜi ſchähliex mannai Noſeedſi-
bai / kattra leela gir.
11. Kas gir tas / kas to Kunghu byſtahs? Wings tam mahzies
to labbaku Zeļļu.
12. Winya Dwehſẜele labbumà dſiewohs / vnd winja Sähkla
to Semm apẜehdehs.
13. Ta Apſchlehpſchana tha Kunga gir ſtarpan teems kattri to
bieſtahs / vnd ẜawu ẜaliedſenaſchanu leek wings teems ſinnaht.
14. Mannas Atzis ſkattahs allaſchien vs to Kunghu / Aiſto
Wings mannu Kayu aran to Tieklu ißwillx.
15. Ghreeſees py mann / vnd eſẜi mann ſchähliex / Aiſto es äßmu
itt weens vnd nabbax.
16. Ta ißbaile mannas Ꞩirdtz gir leela / wedd mann aran man-
nahms mohkams.
17. Vsraugi mannas bähdas vnd Nabbadſibu / vnd peedohd
mann wiſẜus mannus Ghräkus.
18. Reds ka mann tick dauds Eenaidneeki gir / vnd ee=nied mann
no nicknas Ꞩirrdtz.
19. Paſẜargi mannu Dwehſẜel vnd attpeſti mann / Nhe leetz
mann kaunà tapt / aiſto es czerru vs töw.
20. Weenteeſẜiba vnd Taißniba ta laid mann paſẜarga / Aiſto
es ghaidu töwis.
21. Deews ißpeſti Jſrael / aran wiſẜahms winja bähdams.
Ghodtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd
etc.
Der 110. Pſalm.
Weena Dſeeßma Dawida.
TAs Kunx ẜatziya vs mannu Kunghu / ẜehdees py mannu lab-
bu Rohku / teekams es tawus Eenaidneekus par Pammäßlu
taweems Kahyeems leeku.
2. Tas Kunx ẜuhties to Riext tawas Wallſtibas aran Zion /
Walldi ſtarrpan taweems Eenaidneekeems.
3. Pehtz tawu Vswarreſchanu tawi Ļaudis töw labpraht vp-
perehs ſwähtà Krahßnibà / Tawi Bährni tohp töw peedſimbti / ka
ta Raſẜa no to Rietas=ẜarrkanumu.
4. Tas Kunx gir ſwehrehyis vnd tas tam nhe buhs ſchähl / Tu
eſẜi weens Baſnizaskunx muhſchige / pehtz to wies Melchiſedek.
5. Tas Kunx py tawu labbu Rohku / ẜadauſẜies tohs Koning-
jus ẜawas dußmibas laikà.
6. Tas Ꞩohdies ſtarrpan teems Paggaņeems / Tas leelus
Kaŗŗus turrehs / Tas ẜadauſies to Ghallwu par leelahms Sem-
mehms.
7. Tas dſerrs no Vppes vs Zeļļu / tapehtz tas to Ghallwu auk-
ſcham zells.
Ghohtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd
etc.
Der 111. Pſalm.
Halleluja.
ESET patteitzo tam Kungham no wiſẜas Ꞩirrdtz / Eekſchan to
Runnu tho labbo vnd eekſchan tahs Draudſibas.
2. Leeli gir tee Darrbi tha Kunga / kas tohs zeeni / tam
gir Patiekſchana ween py teems.
3. Ko tas darra / tas gir ſchlawäns vnd ghodäns / vnd winja
Taißniba palleek muhſchige.
4. Tas gir weenu Peeminneſchanu ee=ſtadiyis ẜawo Brienu-
mo / tas lehniex vnd ſchäliex Deews.
5. Tas dohd Barribu teems kattri to bieſtahs / tas attminn
muhſchige ſawas ẜaliedſenaſchannas.
6. Tas leek paſluddenaht ẜawus warränus Darrbus ẜaweems
Ļaudeems / ka tas teems dohtu to Manntu to Paggaņo Ļauſcho.
7. Tee Darrbi ẜawas Rokas gir Taißniba vnd Teeſẜa / Wiſẜi
winja Baußli gir pareiſi.
8. Tee tohp vsturrähti allaſch vnd muſchige / vnd noteek ißtitzi-
ge vnd ghodige.
9. Tas ẜuhta ẜawu Attpeſtiſchanu ẜaweems Ļaudeems / Tas
ẜohla / ka winja Ꞩaliedſenaſchanai muhſchige pallickt buhs.
10. Swähtz vnd ghodiex gir winja Wahrtz / ta Biyaſchana tha
Kunga gir tahs Ghuddribas eeẜakums.
11. Ta gir weena krahßna Ghuddriba / kas pehtz to darra / tha
Slawa palleek muhſchige.
Ghohtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd
etc.
Der 112. Pſalm.
Halleluja.
LAbb tam / katters to Kungu bieſtahs / kattram leela pattick-
ſchana gir py winja Baußleems.
2. Tha Ꞩäklai buhs warrähnai buht wirs Semmes /
tas Radds to Labbo buhs ſwehtietz.
3. Baggatiba vnd Pillniba buhs winja Nammohs / vnd winja
Taißniba palleek muhſchige.
4. Teems labbeems vslätz ta Ghaißma eekſchan Tumbſibas / no
to laipnu / ſchähligu vnd taißnu.
5. Labb tam kas ſchähliex gir / vnd labpraht aißdohd /vnd ißtaiſ-
ẜa ẜawas leetas / ka tas nhe weenam nhe=pareiſe darra.
6. Aiſto tas muhſchige pallix / tas Taißnis muhſchige nhe tohp
aißmirrſts.
7. Kad kahdu ļaunu leeta nahkt ghribb / tad tas nhe bieſtahs /
winja Ꞩirdtz czerre nhe biedammees vs to Kungu.
8. Winja Ꞩirdtz gir drohſcha / vnd nhe bieſtahs / Teekams tas
ẜawu Preeku py ẜaweems Eenaidneekeems räds.
9. Wings ißbahrſta / vnd dohd teems Nabbageems / winja
Taißniba palleek muhſchige / winja Raggs tohp pa=auxtenahtz ar
Ghodu.
10. Tas Beßdeewiex redſehs to / vnd tas tam ẜahpehs / ẜawus
Ꞩawus Sobus tas ẜakohdies vnd ißniex / Aiſto ko tee Beßdeewigi
labpraht ghribbätu tas gir wellte.
Ghohtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd
etc.
Der 113. Pſalm.
Halleluja.
SLaweeyeeta juhs Kallpi to Kungu / ſlaweeyeeta to Wahrdu
ta Kunga.
2. Slawähtz laid buht tha Kunga Wahrtz / no ſcho lai-
ku wiſẜà muhſchà.
3. No Ꞩaules Vslehkſchanu lieds winjas Noeeſchanu / laid
ſlawähtam buht tha Kunga Wahrdam.
4. Tas Kunx gir auxtz par wiſẜeems Paggaņeems / Winja
Ghohtz ſteepyahs kamähr tas Debbeſẜis gir.
5. Kas gir ka tas Kunx muhſẜo Deews? katters tick auxte ẜeh-
deyees gir.
6. Vnd vs to Sämmoſchu ſkattahs / eekſchan Debbeſſu vnd
Semmes.
7. Katters to Wahyu vszeļļ no teems Pieſchleems / vnd pa-
auxtena tohs Nabbagus no teems dubbļeems.
8. Ka tas to ſädenatu py teems leeleems Kungeems / py teems
leeleems Kungeems ẜawo Ļauſcho.
9. Katters to Nheaugligu Nammà dſiewoht darra / ka ta wee-
na preeziga Bährno=mahte tohp / Halleluja.
Ghohtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd
etc.
Der 114. Pſalm.
KAd Jſraels no Eegyptes isghaya / ta czillta Jäcoba no teems
ſweſſcheems Ļaudeems.
2. Tad tappa Juda winja Swähtums / Jſraels win-
jam paklauſẜiex.
3. Ta Juhre redſeya vnd bägha / tas Jordans ghreeſehs ẜöw
attpackaļļ.
4. Tee Kallni laxtiya ka te Jähringji / tee Zällmi ka tahs jau-
nas Awis.
5. Kas by töw tu Juhre / ka tu bähzi? Vnd tu Jordan / ka tu
attpackaļļ ghreeſehs.
6. Juhs Kallni / ka juhs laxtiyeeta ka te Jähringji? Juhs Zäll-
mi / ka tahs jaunas Awis?
7. Preekſchan to Kunghu trieſẜeya ta Semme / preekſchan to
Deewu Jacob.
8. Katters tohs Ackmina kallnus pahrwehre par Vdensäſäru /
vnd tohs Ackmiņus par Vdens=Ackeems.
Vier Octonarien aus dem 119. Pſalm.
LAbb teems kattri nhenoſeedſige dſiewo / kattri eekſchan to
Baußlu tha Kunga ſtaigha.
2. Labb teems kattri winja Leezibu turr / kattri winju
no wiſẜas Ꞩirrdtz meckle.
3. Aiſto kattri vs winja Zeļļeems ſtaigha / tee nhe darra nhe nee-
ka ļaun.
4. Tu eſẜi pawäleyis Ꞩirrdige turreht / tawus Pawehleſchanus.
5. O kaut manna dſiewiba tawas Taißnibas ar wiſẜu Ꞩirrdi
turrätu.
6. Kad es ſkattohs ween vs taweems Baußleems / tad nhe toh-
pu es kaunà.
7. Es patteitzo töw no wiſẜas Ꞩirrdtz / ka tu mann mahzi to taiſ-
nibu tawas Teeſẜas.
8. Tawus Taiſnibus ghribbu es turreht / Nhe attſtah mann
muhſchige.
Ghohtz gir tam Thäwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd tam ſwäh-
tam Gharram / Ka no Eeẜakumu gir biyis / vnd palleek muhſcho
muhſcham / Amen.
KA weens Jauneeklis ẜawu zeļļu pareiſe ſtaighahs? Kad tas
ẜöw turrahs pehtz tawu Wahrdu.
10. Es meckleyo töw no wiſẜas Ꞩirrdtz / Nhe leetz mann
alloht no tawutuwu Baußlu.
11. Es patturru tawu Wahrdu mannà Ꞩirrdy / ka es prettieb
töw nhe Ghräkoyo.
12. Ꞩlawätz eſẜi tu Kunx / Mahzi mann tawas Teeſẜas.
13. Es ghribbu ar mannahms Luhpahms ſtahſtiet / wiſẜas Taiſ-
nibas tawas Muttes.
14. Es preezayohs par to Zeļļu tawas leezibas / ka par wiſẜena-
du Baggatibu.
15. Es runnayo ko tu pawehleyis eſẜi / vnd ſkatto vs taweems
Zeļļeems.
16. Mann ghribbahs tawas Taißnibas / vnd es nhe aismirrſto
tawu Wahrdu.
Ghohtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd
etc.
DArri labb tawam Kallpam / ka es dſiewoyo vnd tawu Wahr-
du turro.
18. Attdarri mannas Atzis / ka es rädſo tohs brienu-
mus py tawu Baußlu.
19. Es äßmu Weeſẜis vs Semmes / Nhe paſlepp tawu Bauß-
lu preekſchan mann.
20. Manna Dwehſẜele gir ẜaghrauſieta no illghoſchanas /
Pehtz tawas Taißnibas allaſchien.
21. Tu lamma tohs Läppnus / Nolahdäti gir kattri no ta-
weems Baußleems alloyahs.
22. Ghrees no mann Kaunu vnd Nitzinaſchanu / Aiſto es turru
tawu Leezibu.
23. Jrr tee leeli Kungi ẜehſch vnd runna prettie mann / Bett
taws Kallps runna no tawu Taißnibu.
24. Mann ghribbahs tawas Taißnibas / Tee gir manni Rah-
tes=Kungi. Ghohtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd
etc.
MAnna Dwehſẜele ghull eekſchan Pieſchļeems / Eepreezini
mann pehtz tawu Wahrdu.
26. Es ſtahſtu mannu Zeļļus / vnd tu packlauſẜi mann /
Mahzi mann tawas Taißnibas.
27 Pamahzi mann to Zeļļu tawo Baußlo / tad ghribbu es run-
naht no taweeems Brienummems.
28. Es bähdoyohs / ka mann ta Ꞩirrdtz nokalſt / Eeſtipprini
mann pehtz tawu Wahrdu.
29. Noghrees no mann to nhetaißnu Zeļļu / vnd wehl mann
tawu Baußlu.
30. Es äßmu to Zeļļu tahs Taißnibas ißwehleyees / tawu Teeſ-
ẜu äßmu es preekſch ẜöw litzees.
31. Es kaŗŗu py taweems Leezibeems / Kunx nhe ļaw mann
kaunà tapt.
32. Kad tu mannu Ꞩirrdi eepreezini / tad täcku es to Zeļļu ta-
wo Baußlo.
Ghohtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd
etc.
Das 12. Capittel des Propheten Eſaiae.
Jch dancke dir HErr / das du zornig biſt geweſen vber
etc.
ES patteitzo töw Kunx / ka tu Dußmiex eſẜi vs mann biyis /
vnd tawa Dußmiba attghreeſuſẜees gir / vnd eepreezini mann.
2. Redſi / Deews gir mans Peſtitais / es äßmu ar meeru /
vnd nhe bieſtohs / Aiſto Deews tas Kunx gir manns Spähx / vnd
manna Dſeeßma / vnd gir manns Peſtitais.
3. Juhß eeẜeeta preezadammees Vhdeni ſmellt / no teems Awo-
teems tahs Peſtiſchanas.
4. Vnd ẜatzieſẜeeta tanny laikà / Patteitzeeta tam Kungam / iß-
ẜautzeeta winja Wahrdu / Darrait ſinnamu ſtarrpan teems Ļau-
deems winja Darrbu / paſluddenayeeta ka winja Wahrtz tick auxtz gir.
5. Dſeedaita tam Kungam / aiſto Wings gir ẜöw kraßne pa-
radiyees / to buhs ſinnaht wiſẜahm Semmehm.
6. Liexmo vnd teitz tu Dſiewotaya eekſchann Zion / Aiſto tas
ſwähtz Jſraël gir leels py töw.
Ghohtz gir tam Tähwam / vnd tam Dählam / vnd tam ſwäh-
tam Gharram / ka no Eeẜakumu gir biyis / vnd palleek muhſcho
muhſcham / Amen.
FINIS.
Summa DEo Soli gloria, laus
& honor.
